regimen: Apply 20 drops once daily to the scalp either in the morning or in the evening. Massage evenly and thoroughly into the scalp until you feel the serum has been absorbed. Each bottle should last approximately 2 months with proper application.Please Note: Do not apply to eyelashes or eyebrows. Do not exceed recommended dosage.
name: Grow Gorgeous Hair Density Serum Intense (60ml)
description: Achieve visibly thicker hair with the Hair Growth Serum Intense from Grow Gorgeous, developed with a 40% concentration of nine technologies. Grow Gorgeous aims to stimulate the hair and scalp for healthy-looking hair that is protected from external damage, without causing harm to you.

With its Stabilized Dihydroquercetin-Glucoside Complex, the serum contains glycine and zinc to improve hair length for a fuller appearance, whilst a unique form of water-compatible caffeine absorbs into the scalp to reduce hair loss in a small time period.

Its Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3 and Clover Flower Extract Active Complex has been proven to visibly increase hair density by 13% within four months, whilst Bio-Active Pea Sprout starts to work within two weeks to improve hair growth by 78%. Enriched with hyaluronic acid to penetrate the scalp and boost hydration so you can experience luscious, voluminous locks. E.N.
This product is available as Hair Density Serum Intense in certain markets. The product formulation is the same in all markets.

name: NuFACE Trinity Facial Trainer and ELE Attachment Set (Worth $474.00)
description: NuFACE Trinity® device is required to use with this attachment.

Two microcurrent attachments in one kit! Our award-winning, multi-solution NuFACE Trinity® with Facial Trainer attachment is clinically-tested for improved facial contour, skin tone and wrinkle reduction in as little as 5-minutes a day.* Plus, effectively target hard-to-reach eyebrow furrows, crow's feet and smile lines with the NuFACE Trinity® ELE, a targeted microcurrent treatment attachment.
The NuFACE Trinity® Facial Trainer is clinically-tested for improved facial contour, skin tone and wrinkle reduction in as little as 5-minutes a day.*
*ENGAGE Clinical Study
Fitness for Your Face™

Exercise sculpts and tones the body, microcurrent contours and tones the face. Like exercise, benefits are visible and long-lasting with continued use. NuFACE is Fitness for Your Face, the easiest workout you’ll ever do!
Skin Care is Your Nutrition + Microcurrent is Your Exercise.
As we age, our body’s natural current begins to slow down (like our metabolism) leading to sagging skin, loss of contour & wrinkles.

{'date': u'2015-03-12', 'rating_score': u'80.0%', 'rating_title': u'comparing nuface trinity vs mini', 'review_text': u'If you are like me and are trying to figure out which one to get the trinity (full size) or mini get the full size. I got both, but if I was to do it again I would go for the full size. The trinity has more power, the mini just isnt smaller in size it has a smaller battery so you can only do the basic strokes and not 5 sec more. The trinity has a lot more power it can got for 20min and you have the power to do the optional strokes. You just cant leave it connected (like a cell phone and keep on using it when the battery is flat/or low) it turns its self off. The full size also lets you increase the power setting. I have been using it for a month so far, so maybe i need to give it the full 60d for full effect, but unlike others I do not see any immediate result, and expecting that is probably unrealistic. . The difference at this point is probably only one that I would notice. (I am 49 and would like to minimize laugh lines and periorbital area-hollow under eyes). So I dont look like the 19yo girl with perfectly smooth skin on the nuface box just yet. I am hoping that I will see more improvement after 60days. Doing the basic strokes recommended, can be done', 'author_name': u'MJ207'}

People compliment me on my healthy and youthful glow, and I have noticed that my skin has become softer, smoother, and red patches are gone. My previous sensitive skin condition has improved as well.Everyday that I wake up, I find my skin in better condition: rested, hydrated, and glowing. I've never looked better and I'm in my late 30s.This is the best combination you can get with Nuface, the trainer is good for big areas, but you also still need the ELE attachment for more delicate areas.I highly recommend this for all my friends and family.", 'author_name': u'GrandeLatte'}

regimen: Start by selecting your desired speed and heat setting. Rough dry hair until it is 80% dry. Section hair, then place a barrel brush underneath the first section starting at the roots and pull down, always directing the airflow at the brush. When you get to the ends, roll the hair back up to your head and hold for a few seconds. Release and move on to the next section. Continue this process with all sections until your hair is fully styled. For a polished effect and to set the style, select the Cool Shot and blow hair all over with cool air.
name: T3 Featherweight Compact Dryer
benefit: T3 Tourmaline® + Ceramic: Emits negative ions and far infrared heat for healthy, shiny results.
T3 SoftAire™: Delivers a high volume of ion-enriched air that dries large sections of hair—fast.
2 Speeds/Heat Settings: To style all hair types and textures.
Cool Shot: Cool air locks in any style for a smooth, lasting finish.
Dual Voltage (125/250V): Easy-to-use switch for the perfect blowout while traveling abroad. (Plug adapter needed.)
Folding Handle: Offers the same sturdiness and easy grip of full-size dryers, while folding conveniently for easy storage in small spaces.
Concentrator Included: Directs enriched airflow for more precise drying.
9ft Cord with Cord Wrap: Professional-length cord for ease of use.
Lightweight and Quiet: Superlight body and quiet operation for an effortless drying experience.
Scratch Resistant Surface: Designed to resist minor scratches to keep your dryer looking like new.
Travel Tote: Securely stores your dryer for easy packing.
2-Year Warranty: Comprehensive coverage and support options.
description: This speed-styling wonder packs all the features of a full-size dryer in an ultra-light body to make blow drying a breeze. The unique folding handle helps eliminate space-waste, making this petite-yet-powerful dryer ideal for storage in small places or styling on-the-go. Dry hair fast and healthy anytime, anywhere with 2 Speeds/heat settings, a cool hot and dual voltage.
T3 Tourmaline® SoftAire™ Technology:

Other dryers use a hurricane-like, chaotic windflow and high heat, which can damage the cuticle and cause split ends, frizz and flyaways. T3 Featherweight Dryers work differently. A specially-engineered fan generates a high volume of air and weaves it through the dryer at a soft, gentle speed, enriching it with negative ions and far infrared heat. The enriched airflow exits the dryer in a wide cone shape that dries large sections of hair—fast. Negative ions in the airflow cancel static and quickly seal the cuticle, which helps hair retain natural moisture, reduces frizz and enhances shine.

regimen: DIPBROW is best applied with an angled brow brush with short, stiff bristles. You can easily outline and fill a perfect eyebrow. After you are finished applying the desired amount of color, be sure to blend with a clean spooley brush.

{'date': u'2010-12-17', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Exceeded my expectations', 'review_text': u"i've been contemplating whether to buy skinceuticals products for months due to my skepticsm. but i finally made the jump after i saw a deal on skinstore.com and knowing that i can safely return the product if i didn't like it. my conclusion? i think it's by far the best face product i have purchased in my 30 years. i have tried all of the other expensive products out in the market but never felt as if they lived up to their price- skII, la mer, darphin, and more. i tried c e ferulic for the first time last night following their superclean cleanser, then followed it by b5 hyrdrating gel. my skin was supersoft and it actually looked dewy. i couldn't wait to wake up this morning to wash my face and use it again. i need to wait to determine its effect on my sunspots, but as far as change i feel in my skin's texture after just 2 uses, it hard to believe that it's going to get better and better. i'm a true believer. if this keeps up, i dont think i'll be using any other brands, and that means a lot coming from a fickle person like me. i've never used or praised any other brands. i have a normal/dry skin, hence the reason why i purchased the c e ferulic over the phloretin cf, just an fyi. ive read people complaining of the smell, but i honestly dont smell anything. i guess our olfactory senses differ so you'd have to try before not liking the smell. also, even the bottle's small, the direction advises using only 4-5 drops(c e) and 2-3(hydrating gel), which means that it'll probably last me a very very long time. definitely worth it's price. im absolutely thrilled with my purchase.", 'author_name': u'rosemary116'}

{'date': u'2009-05-22', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Radiance in a Bottle!', 'review_text': u"When I ordered this product I had buyers remorse. I've been using this product in the morning followed by SkinCeauticals 45 Sport Spf. At night I use MD Forte Skin Cream III, and always put on Neostrata's very affordable yet effective eye cream. description: The LUNA mini is a revolutionary facial-cleansing device. Combining sophisticated T-Sonic™ pulsations with a gentle silicone brush, the LUNA mini provides deep yet gentle cleansing, leaving your complexion looking clearer, brighter and healthier.

The non-porous brush is bacteria resistant and up to 35 times more hygienic than standard nylon brush heads. The LUNA mini's three-zone brush is suitable for all skin types and has over 1,300 touch points to draw out impurities for a glowing and radiant complexion. This powerful device gently removes dead skin cells and unclogs pores of dirt, oil and makeup residue to reveal more vibrant, even-toned skin.
Designed to fit in the palm of your hand, the LUNA mini requires no replacement brushes, has two adjustable intensities and can be used up to five months after one full charge.

description: Achieve visibly thicker hair with the Hair Growth Serum Intense from Grow Gorgeous, developed with a 40% concentration of nine technologies. Grow Gorgeous aims to stimulate the hair and scalp for healthy-looking hair that is protected from external damage, without causing harm to you.

With its Stabilized Dihydroquercetin-Glucoside Complex, the serum contains glycine and zinc to improve hair length for a fuller appearance, whilst a unique form of water-compatible caffeine absorbs into the scalp to reduce hair loss in a small time period.

Its Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3 and Clover Flower Extract Active Complex has been proven to visibly increase hair density by 13% within four months, whilst Bio-Active Pea Sprout starts to work within two weeks to improve hair growth by 78%. {'date': u'2015-03-12', 'rating_score': u'80.0%', 'rating_title': u'comparing nuface trinity vs mini', 'review_text': u'If you are like me and are trying to figure out which one to get the trinity (full size) or mini get the full size. I got both, but if I was to do it again I would go for the full size. The trinity has more power, the mini just isnt smaller in size it has a smaller battery so you can only do the basic strokes and not 5 sec more. The trinity has a lot more power it can got for 20min and you have the power to do the optional strokes. You just cant leave it connected (like a cell phone and keep on using it when the battery is flat/or low) it turns its self off. The full size also lets you increase the power setting. I have been using it for a month so far, so maybe i need to give it the full 60d for full effect, but unlike others I do not see any immediate result, and expecting that is probably unrealistic. . The difference at this point is probably only one that I would notice. (I am 49 and would like to minimize laugh lines and periorbital area-hollow under eyes). So I dont look like the 19yo girl with perfectly smooth skin on the nuface box just yet. I am hoping that I will see more improvement after 60days. Doing the basic strokes recommended, can be done', 'author_name': u'MJ207'}

{'date': u'2014-12-26', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Fantastic skincare device', 'review_text': u"I've had this device for a few weeks now. Ever since the first use, I've noticed slight uplift in my eyebrows, and cheeks, as well as a more defined look for my jawlines.I use this device for about 15 minutes daily in the mornings. 10 minutes with the packaged trainer and 5 minutes with the ELE attachment. People compliment me on my healthy and youthful glow, and I have noticed that my skin has become softer, smoother, and red patches are gone. My previous sensitive skin condition has improved as well.Everyday that I wake up, I find my skin in better condition: rested, hydrated, and glowing. I've never looked better and I'm in my late 30s.This is the best combination you can get with Nuface, the trainer is good for big areas, but you also still need the ELE attachment for more delicate areas.I highly recommend this for all my friends and family.", 'author_name': u'GrandeLatte'}

regimen: Use as part of your daily routine. Saturate cotton pad with Cleansing Water. Close eye and place cotton on lid. After a few seconds, sweep cotton across lid from the top downward. Wipe cotton under eyes starting from the inside moving outward. Sweep gently across face to remove makeup. For specific small areas, saturate a cotton swab.Helpful Hint: Place saturated cotton on area of makeup removal and hold for 3 - 5 seconds before wiping.

Free of Alcohol, Artificial Colors, Fragrance and Mineral Oil

regimen: Start by selecting your desired speed and heat setting. Rough dry hair until it is 80% dry. Section hair, then place a barrel brush underneath the first section starting at the roots and pull down, always directing the airflow at the brush. When you get to the ends, roll the hair back up to your head and hold for a few seconds. Release and move on to the next section. Continue this process with all sections until your hair is fully styled. For a polished effect and to set the style, select the Cool Shot and blow hair all over with cool air.
name: T3 Featherweight Compact Dryer
benefit: T3 Tourmaline® + Ceramic: Emits negative ions and far infrared heat for healthy, shiny results.
T3 SoftAire™: Delivers a high volume of ion-enriched air that dries large sections of hair—fast.
2 Speeds/Heat Settings: To style all hair types and textures.
Cool Shot: Cool air locks in any style for a smooth, lasting finish.
Dual Voltage (125/250V): Easy-to-use switch for the perfect blowout while traveling abroad. (Plug adapter needed.)
Folding Handle: Offers the same sturdiness and easy grip of full-size dryers, while folding conveniently for easy storage in small spaces.
Concentrator Included: Directs enriched airflow for more precise drying.
9ft Cord with Cord Wrap: Professional-length cord for ease of use.
Lightweight and Quiet: Superlight body and quiet operation for an effortless drying experience.
Scratch Resistant Surface: Designed to resist minor scratches to keep your dryer looking like new.
Travel Tote: Securely stores your dryer for easy packing.
2-Year Warranty: Comprehensive coverage and support options.
description: This speed-styling wonder packs all the features of a full-size dryer in an ultra-light body to make blow drying a breeze. The unique folding handle helps eliminate space-waste, making this petite-yet-powerful dryer ideal for storage in small places or styling on-the-go. Dry hair fast and healthy anytime, anywhere with 2 Speeds/heat settings, a cool hot and dual voltage.
T3 Tourmaline® SoftAire™ Technology:

Other dryers use a hurricane-like, chaotic windflow and high heat, which can damage the cuticle and cause split ends, frizz and flyaways. T3 Featherweight Dryers work differently. A specially-engineered fan generates a high volume of air and weaves it through the dryer at a soft, gentle speed, enriching it with negative ions and far infrared heat. The enriched airflow exits the dryer in a wide cone shape that dries large sections of hair—fast. Negative ions in the airflow cancel static and quickly seal the cuticle, which helps hair retain natural moisture, reduces frizz and enhances shine.

regimen: DIPBROW is best applied with an angled brow brush with short, stiff bristles. You can easily outline and fill a perfect eyebrow. After you are finished applying the desired amount of color, be sure to blend with a clean spooley brush.
name: Anastasia Dipbrow Pomade - Dark Brown
description: A waterproof brow color ideal for sculpting, defining, and carving perfectly precise brows that won’t fade. Smudge-free, creamy formula glides on skin and adheres to hair. Must-have for oily skin and humid climates. Tighten cap to prevent drying.

All the products from this line is fab.The best out on the market for sure!", 'author_name': u'skincaregirl'}

{'date': u'2010-01-15', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'A definite repurchase!', 'review_text': u'I have been using this for about a month, and am very pleased with the results. For me, this serum has evened out my skin tone, has improved the texture of my skin, and feel that it is clearer/"glowy". I find myself needing to use less foundation to cover up my trouble areas.I plan to repurchase this.', 'author_name': u'RTvh'}

{'date': u'2010-01-14', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Wonderful!', 'review_text': u'This is GREAT!, Really, I have tried other serums in order to give this one a break, but by far this is the best. I DO notice the difference and people around me as well. Lots of compliments on my skin. Too bad they have increased the price on this product! :(', 'author_name': u'Rossi'}

{'date': u'2009-11-17', 'rating_score': u'80%', 'rating_title': u'Wonderful product!', 'review_text': u'This product is for prevention. It is one of the best antioxidants out there. Gets best ratings over and over.', 'author_name': u'Mere'}

{'date': u'2009-09-25', 'rating_score': u'60%', 'rating_title': u'Okay', 'review_text': u"For the price I expected far more dramatic results. Of course it's difficult to judge a product that has a preventive purpose, but my skin looked the same as when I was not using it and given its price tag, I probably won't be buying another bottle.", 'author_name': u'SkincareJunkie'}

{'date': u'2009-09-17', 'rating_score': u'20%', 'rating_title': u"Worst Facial Product I've Every Tried", 'review_text': u'I have used SkinCeutical Products for a very long time. My Anestician uses these products and I have grown to trust and rely on this brand. However, this is without a doubt the worst product I have ever purchased. Do not be lured into a purchase by a magazine recommendation. Talk to a professional or someone you know personally before making a purchase like this.', 'author_name': u'barkaboutit'}

{'date': u'2009-09-13', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'This product is a MUST for aging skin!', 'review_text': u'This product is a great anti-oxidant. I have been using it faithfully for years and find it is essential to maintaining the tone and quality of my skin. It is not a skin cream however, and I believe it should be supplemented with one.It can also be irritating to sensitive skin, as it contains vitamin c and that is somewhat acidic. However, that said, this is the antioxidant that will keep your skin supple and prevent the formation all manner of signs of visible sun damage in aging skin. I highly recommend it, not as "magic" but as a part of sensible and successful formula to retain a youthful complexion.', 'author_name': u'Mzscahlett'}

{'date': u'2009-08-04', 'rating_score': u'60%', 'rating_title': u'Okay.  Lightweight.', 'review_text': u'Not sure this is worth the money.. I didn\'t notice a change in my skin except it turned my neck yellow. I like this better than the Phlorentin CF, as it is more moisturizing and not an exfoliator like the Phlorentin CF. My only reason for maybe buying this again, is that it is supposed to help "prevent" sun damage, otherwise, it didn\'t help heal existing sundamage or reduce wrinkles or any of the claims. I wish it did!', 'author_name': u'SkinJunkie'}

{'date': u'2009-07-24', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'I Love The Results!', 'review_text': u"I love this product because of the results I am getting. In just 2 weeks my face looks smoother and younger. The only thing I don't like is for the first 2 hours my face seems shiny and it is uncomfortable if you need to go out. But the results are amazing.", 'author_name': u'Irina'}

{'date': u'2009-07-12', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'The magic elixir', 'review_text': u'I am not one to write reviews, but I feel an obligation to state how amazing this stuff is. I felt a difference on my skin the first time I used it: improved tightness, clarity and tone. My skin literally glows. The smell is not wonderful, but not as bad as some other reviewers have claimed, as you get used to it and it sinks in pretty quickly. A little pricey, but well worth it!!!', 'author_name': u'zztop'}

{'date': u'2009-07-02', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u"Can't be without this stuff!", 'review_text': u"First off, I love that the company explains in detail how the serum works. It's helping to prevent & correct photodamage, which is the primary cause of aging. But really I keep buying it because my skin looks 100 times better when I use it. It's the one product that I don't ever switch out in my routine. You absolutely get what you pay for.", 'author_name': u'SkinRN'}

{'date': u'2009-06-23', 'rating_score': u'20%', 'rating_title': u'Not sure about this product', 'review_text': u"I got this about one month ago and used it for a couple weeks but stopped because it just doesn't feel good on. It is really greasy, sticky and doesn't absorb. I started using it again because it cost so much and I don't want to waste my money.. haven't noticed any difference yet... can't wait till its all gone!", 'author_name': u'stephanie'}

{'date': u'2009-05-22', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Radiance in a Bottle!', 'review_text': u"When I ordered this product I had buyers remorse. Check the price and you'll know what I mean! But, a week into use and my skin looks smoother and more even. I don't want to risk being without it. And, this is coming from someone who has used Chantecaille, Revive, La Mer, La Prarie, as well as having had Fraxel laser treatments. I'm 31 and have been a tanning bed junkie since I was 16. Now I wish I would have listened to my mother and never stepped foot in one. My skin had become damaged, but with my newly acquired skin care regimen, my skin has been greatly improved. I've been using this product in the morning followed by SkinCeauticals 45 Sport Spf. At night I use MD Forte Skin Cream III, and always put on Neostrata's very affordable yet effective eye cream. I wash my face with MD Forte's hydrating cleanser using the Clarisonic. This combination has gotten rid of melasma from my pregnancy, sun damage, and large pores. None of this was done with those overpriced skin care lines from Neiman Marcus. I'm thrilled! Now, I just have to become an SPF junkie and I should be fine (finally, after years of trial and error--$$$$).", 'author_name': u'SkinObsessed'}

{'date': u'2009-03-04', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Worth every cent!', 'review_text': u"This is the one product that I use that I can truly tell a difference in my skin. Last time I ran out I didn't have it for a few days and could see that my skin did not look as healthy and my wrinkles were more noticable. Really a great product!", 'author_name': u'brmom2002'}

{'date': u'2010-12-17', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Exceeded my expectations', 'review_text': u"i've been contemplating whether to buy skinceuticals products for months due to my skepticsm. but i finally made the jump after i saw a deal on skinstore.com and knowing that i can safely return the product if i didn't like it. my conclusion? i think it's by far the best face product i have purchased in my 30 years. i have tried all of the other expensive products out in the market but never felt as if they lived up to their price- skII, la mer, darphin, and more. i tried c e ferulic for the first time last night following their superclean cleanser, then followed it by b5 hyrdrating gel. my skin was supersoft and it actually looked dewy. i couldn't wait to wake up this morning to wash my face and use it again. i need to wait to determine its effect on my sunspots, but as far as change i feel in my skin's texture after just 2 uses, it hard to believe that it's going to get better and better. i'm a true believer. if this keeps up, i dont think i'll be using any other brands, and that means a lot coming from a fickle person like me. i've never used or praised any other brands. i have a normal/dry skin, hence the reason why i purchased the c e ferulic over the phloretin cf, just an fyi. ive read people complaining of the smell, but i honestly dont smell anything. i guess our olfactory senses differ so you'd have to try before not liking the smell. also, even the bottle's small, the direction advises using only 4-5 drops(c e) and 2-3(hydrating gel), which means that it'll probably last me a very very long time. definitely worth it's price. im absolutely thrilled with my purchase.", 'author_name': u'rosemary116'}

{'date': u'2010-10-25', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Protection & Vitamins', 'review_text': u'I actually use this all over. After a shower, before I put on moisturizer, I dispense a few drops in the palm of my hand and apply while skin is still slightly wet. esp on neck, face, declotte and arms so I get extra sun protection and anti-aging benefits on these areas as well as face.I see and feel an improvement. I do wish they could put it in an different container. Always afraid I am going to knock it over.', 'author_name': u'Pashi'}

{'date': u'2010-10-24', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Great for aging skin!', 'review_text': u"I added this product to my morning skincare regimen a few years ago (first thing I apply to my face, followed by moisturizer/sunscreen). Within weeks my skin felt softer and looked younger, dewier and more radiant than it had in years.Yes, it's expensive. But yes, it's worth it. I haven't received this many compliments on my skin since I was in college.", 'author_name': u'Oldsquaw'}

{'date': u'2010-10-22', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'CE Ferulic', 'review_text': u'I\'ve been using this product for almost 6 months and the results have been miraculous! I was just out for dinner with a friend and the first thing she said was "Your skin looks great. What are you using?" That says it all. The product is so easy to use and it makes my skin feel so smooth.Thanks. PCA for a great product', 'author_name': u'Aida'}

{'date': u'2010-10-19', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'ce ferulic', 'review_text': u'used this a few summers ago i saw a change in texture of my skin and theway my skin looked while using it and liked the protection', 'author_name': u'cbaz'}

{'date': u'2010-07-06', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'My All Time Fav Product', 'review_text': u'It was def love at first sight with this product. Now I wish I would have listened to my mother and never stepped foot in one. My skin had become damaged, but with my newly acquired skin care regimen, my skin has been greatly improved. I've been using this product in the morning followed by SkinCeauticals 45 Sport Spf. At night I use MD Forte Skin Cream III, and always put on Neostrata's very affordable yet effective eye cream. I wash my face with MD Forte's hydrating cleanser using the Clarisonic. This combination has gotten rid of melasma from my pregnancy, sun damage, and large pores. None of this was done with those overpriced skin care lines from Neiman Marcus. I'm thrilled! description: The LUNA mini is a revolutionary facial-cleansing device. Combining sophisticated T-Sonic™ pulsations with a gentle silicone brush, the LUNA mini provides deep yet gentle cleansing, leaving your complexion looking clearer, brighter and healthier.

The non-porous brush is bacteria resistant and up to 35 times more hygienic than standard nylon brush heads. The LUNA mini's three-zone brush is suitable for all skin types and has over 1,300 touch points to draw out impurities for a glowing and radiant complexion. This powerful device gently removes dead skin cells and unclogs pores of dirt, oil and makeup residue to reveal more vibrant, even-toned skin.
Designed to fit in the palm of your hand, the LUNA mini requires no replacement brushes, has two adjustable intensities and can be used up to five months after one full charge.

regimen: 3 Minute Peel: This is not a mask. Cleanse skin and leave slightly damp. Spread gel thinly and quickly over your forehead, cheeks, chin, neck, and decollete. Quickly begin massaging these areas in a circular motion with slightly damp hands using light to moderate pressure. After 15-20 seconds, solids should form under the fingertips. This means the peel is activating correctly as the gel is now combining with your dead skin (proteins). Massage for 2-3 minutes or until all of the gel has combined with dead skin. Cleanse area again. To save time, try using the peel in the shower! Just pat your face and hands mostly dry and the use the peel as directed.  Upon completion, turn back to the shower head to rinse.  The water pressure will also assist with removal of the tiny solids from fine facial hair.3 Minute Peel - Body: In shower, cleanse skin with a mild cleanser. Pat area dry, but leave slightly damp. It is best to peel one area at a time and a small amount goes a long way. For example, squeeze a small amount of gel from the pouch and spread it thinly over one forearm, upper arm, and shoulder. Quickly begin massaging the area in a circular motion with slightly damp hands. You will feel the polishing sand right away. Continue to massage and the gel peel starts to combine with surface proteins and debris after about 15-20 second so at this stage, you will begin to feel tiny, new solids under the fingertips. This means the peel is activating correctly and the gel is now combining with your dead skin (proteins). Massage for 2-3 minutes or until all of the gel has combined with dead skin. The peel will look and feel slightly foamy. The polishing sand assists with complete removal of the tiny solids from the surface of the skin for smooth, hydrated, velvety skin. Cleanse area peeled again and go on to the next area to be peeled. Remember to pat dry each area and hands to remove excess moisture. Slightly damp hands and skin produce the best results. After peeling, apply rich moisturiser.Serum: Cleanse skin with a mild cleanser. Pat dry.  Dispense 3-4 drops of Daily Serum onto the fingertips and spread evenly over face, neck, and décolleté. Repeat twice daily prior to adding additional skin care and cosmetics products.  Ideally, the serum should be worn on the skin everyday all year around under other products like moisturizer, foundation, and sun block.  We strongly advocate the skin protection standards set by the Skin Cancer Foundation and the CDC and recommend using an effective physical sun block every day of the year.Rescue Masks: Tear the mask pouch open across the top. Remove the fabric mask and unfold it until the face-shape is clearly visible. Apply to clean dry skin and press the wrinkles out of the mask so the mask fits snugly to the face. Wear the mask for about 20-30 minutes or until it feels dry and begins to lift. This is an indication that all the serum has been absorbed into the skin. During the process, continually smooth excess serum into the neck and décolleté. Keep the pouch nearby. When the mask is removed, squeeze all the remaining serum out of the pouch and press into the skin to ensure that not one drop of this amazing serum is wasted by being left in the pouch.Cleanser: Dispense a dime-sized amount of cleanser onto fingertips and gently work into a foamy lather. Massage over the face in light circular motions. Gentle enough to use on eye lids and under eyes. Keep out of eyes and avoid ingestion into nose and mouth. Rinse with cool or warm water. Repeat morning and night.
description: combines a selection of must-have skincare products to leave your complexion looking bright, refined and detoxified.

An exfoliating face peel that expertly removes dead skin to reveal a soft and renewed complexion. Its blend of ingredients work into skin, combining with your complexion’s natural proteins to help lift away dead skin and reveal a brighter, more illuminated face and neck.

An exfoliating body peel infused with polishing sand to slough away dead skin. Enriched with hydrating ingredients and an invigorating fragrance, the formula will leave skin feeling soft, refreshed and luminous.

A lightweight, protein-rich serum that works to improve the appearance of skin and protect from environmental aggressors. Fortified with a proprietary MTHV Complex®, the serum delivers a veil of invisible protection to keep skin safeguarded from oxidative stress whilst reducing the look of dark spots, fine lines and wrinkles. Expect a brighter, more even-looking complexion.

A weekly face mask infused with a firming serum to protect, detoxify and brighten the look of your skin. Infused with a proprietary MTHV Complex®, the protein and antioxidant-rich mask acts as a delivery system for the intensive serum; it transports beneficial ingredients into your skin to help protect against free radicals and remove toxins.

A revitalising, foaming cleanser that lifts away makeup, oil and impurities to leave skin fresh and revived. Infused with a host of hydrating ingredients and deep cleansing Amino Acids, the cleanser expertly refreshes skin whilst imparting a natural Grapefruit fragrance to invigorate the senses. Expect a smooth and soft complexion.

description: 'Your Pregnancy Essentials Kit' from Mama Mio is a collection of the best-selling products to help keep your skin looking and feeling healthy during pregnancy. E.N.

Help reduce the appearance of pregnancy stretch marks with The Tummy Rub Butter. Enriched with omega 3, 6 and 9 essential fatty acids to help build the skin's strength and elasticity. Organic Shea butter provides a barrier to lock in moisture, sweet almond oil soothes and coconut oil. Specially formulated with organic rosehip oil to give maximum protection and reduce the appearance of stretch marks during and after pregnancy, and argan oil to nourish the skin. The luxurious butter works to hydrate skin.
Rub on twice daily, from above your breasts to below your bottom – front, back and sides. For best results, keep rubbing for at least four months after baby has arrived.

Gently cleanse skin with the foaming Gorgeous Glow Balancing Facial Wash. Specially formulated with tea tree oil, whilst green tea leaf extract provides powerful antioxidants to help shield skin. The luxurious face wash contains a blend of natural, coconut-derived cleansers enriched with organic omegas and vitamins to nourish skin and increase elasticity. Experience a boost in radiance and skin that is full of moisture with a brighter complexion.
Apply a small amount to face and massage gently, concentrating on the T-zone. Rinse well and pat dry.

The Pregnancy Boob Tube Bust Cream helps increase the elasticity of skin whilst inspiring a healthy looking glow. Enriched with organic omega oils, Boob Tube helps to hydrate and delivers antioxidants to strengthen and reduce the appearance of wrinkles. Specially formulated with unique green cabbage leaf extract, search the internet for its perceived benefits. Its new and improved formula makes it pregnancy and breastfeeding safe.
Apply from below breasts up to the neck daily throughout pregnancy. For best results, continue use for at least six months after baby has arrived.

Help revive tired legs with 'Lucky Legs' Cooling Leg Gel, a lightweight yet powerful gel to leave legs and feet feeling comfortable. Formulated with essential, nourishing oils, menthols and spearmint to relax and refresh skin. The additional pressure and water retention when carrying a baby can start to weigh you down, so its compact size fits perfectly in your handbag for whenever you require a boost.
Apply two pumps from knees to toes and massage in.

regimen: Scoop 1 to 1½ teaspoon into palm of hand. Warm by rubbing between hands until it transforms into a nourishing oil. Distribute evenly throughout hair and scalp. For overly damaged hair, apply gentle heat from a hairdryer for 5 minutes or alternatively leave the treatment in overnight. Be sure to place a towel over your pillowcase or wear a shower cap over your head to protect bed linens. Use weekly.

regimen: Application: Apply just like a regular mascara. It is important that you do not use conditioners, lotions, etc... before applying the mascara. blinc requires a dry, clean surface in order to adhere properly to your lashes. It takes about 2 minutes to set and begin forming the tiny "tubes" around your lashes. Do not let it set before applying another coat in order to build...keep adding coats until you are satisfied with the volume, length and degree of lash separation before mascara sets. Once it sets, you can no longer build.Removal: Only when you are ready, blinc Mascara can easily be removed with a combination of warm water and gentle pressure with your fingertips. Pressure alone is not enough, and water alone is not enough. It must be a combination of lots of warm water and gentle pressure - for example taking a shower, will make the tiny tubes effortlessly slide off your lashes. You will actually see the tiny tubes in your hand. If you insist on using a makeup remover, you must use a water-base remover not an oil-based remover. Nothing oily can make it come off...not even if you have really oily skin.Tip: With blinc Mascara, you will not have to re-apply mascara throughout the day since it does not flake away like most oil-based paint mascaras. Whether your daily activities take you from the office, to your sweaty workout and then out to dinner, you will look as good in the evening as it did in the morning.
name: Blinc Black Mascara 6g
description: blinc Mascara is the original mascara invented to form tiny water-resistant “tubes” around your lashes rather than painting them like conventional mascaras. Once applied, the tubes bind to your lashes and cannot run, smudge, clump, or flake, even if you cry or rub your eyes.

blinc Mascara will add both volume and length to give you a radiant natural look that lasts all day. Only when you are ready for removal, the tubes will effortlessly slide off your lashes into your hand without the use of a harsh makeup remover. All it takes is the combination of lots of warm water and gentle pressure and the tubes will slide off your lashes effortlessly. Upon removal you will actually see the tiny tubes in your hand!

blinc Mascara has been clinically tested to be non-irritating making it ideal for sensitive eyes, contact lens wearers, and active people in search of a mascara whose look, hold and ease of removal is without compromise.
reviews: {'date': u'2012-08-25', 'rating_score': u'80.0%', 'rating_title': u'favorite mascara', 'review_text': u"I've fallen in love with this mascara!It goes on easy and never smudges or runs. I have long lashes, but not thick lashes; blinc is no better than most mascaras I've tried for making my lashes look thicker, however the lack of smudging and running make up for it.", 'author_name': u'veroamore'}

{'date': u'2011-05-26', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Blinc mascara', 'review_text': u"I am a self professed mascara junkie. I have tried just about everything out there. {'date': u'2011-05-16', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u"can't live without", 'review_text': u'I have been using this mascara for over 2 years. 2 weeks ago I lost my blinc mascara and have been using backups (just conventional store bought stuff I had on hand) . I am dying!the best part about the blinc mascara is that it is SO easy to remove and get it ALL off! no remover ! just soap and waterI have deep set eyes and long eyelashes so for 38 years I never wore mascara on my bottom eyelashes because it would smudge all over under my eye in about an hour - except on special occasions when I\'d then wear waterproof because I was willing to use eye remover.....(I don\'t think all that "rubbing" is good for your eye and I can\'t stand the residue)Anyway, the Blinc stays on my lashes for about a good 36 hours before it starts to wear/fall off.I agree as some have mentioned that it is rather thin, but in my experience that only lasts for probably the first few wears (4-5 days) and then it gets a little thicker (i have found all mascara does this, it gets glunkier over time and if you just wash the brush 1-2/months or so it seems to help) I am not one to like overly thick, matted lashes anyway and prefer it to be thinner, so this works for me.The first time I bought it I thought I was crazy to spend 24$ but now I can\'t live with out it....I will NEVER buy anything else, if I can help it. I am on my 4 or 5th tube and I usually make them last about a 6 months or more.', 'author_name': u'lynnski'}

reviews: {'date': u'2013-11-25', 'rating_score': u'60.0%', 'rating_title': u"I don't understand Avene anymore...", 'review_text': u'Avene used to be my favorite skincare. It didn\'t improve the skin texture or firm the skin very well, but it does its own job fantastically; it calms down my skin and gets it back to normal so I can use other more effective products. I guess now Avene decides to develop its own "more effective" products to keep its customers and carry way more products than before, most of which, however, aren\'t appealing to me at all. I don\'t understand why a cleanser supposed to be designed for sensitive skins has so much fragrance and dye in it. It is your quality rather than the blue color that calms down our skin, right? The most calming face cream for sensitive skin, instead, got discontinued. And I even started getting allergic to some of the Avene\'s.', 'author_name': u'Lavenderstory'}

reviews: {'date': u'2015-05-19', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Great for Face AND Body!', 'review_text': u'I\'m a bit of a sunscreen junkie - I have around five full-size and dozens of samples on hand at all times. I thought that the product was a body sunscreen. Usually facial sun products are 1oz.But this sunscreen works GREAT for both face and body! No, it\'s not totally matte. It does give your skin a bit of that "sunscreen shine". You\'ll need to use powder if you want a matte complexion. Other than the shine, this lotion absorbed quickly, did not interfere with other skin treatments or cosmetics, and the scent was inoffensive. regimen: Application for Face: Squeeze a dime-sized amount onto your finger. Touch the forehead, nose, cheeks, and chin with the finger to distribute product. Apply daily until a golden tan has been achieved.Application for Body: Squeeze an amount the size of a quarter in the palm of hand. {'date': u'2010-11-07', 'rating_score': u'60.0%', 'rating_title': u'Watch for Allergies', 'review_text': u"I recently had a Total FX. For the first week, using the heavy petroleum jelly product prescribed, I was healing normally. The second week, my doctor switched me to the lighter SkinCeuticals repair cream. Within a day my face was raw and broken out. I saw my doctor right away, on a Friday. He stated it looked like an allergy and prescribed another cream, which my pharmacy would not have until Monday. Since the SkinCeuticals cream was specificly supposed to be soothing and healing, I did not suspect that it might be the allergen, nor did he say so. I continued using it for another day, and got worse. I stopped using it and switched to an OTC lotion. Overnight my rash started clearing up. I do NOT normally have sensitive skin, and the only allergy I have is to avocados. There's no avocado oil in the product, but I definitely have an allergy to something in it. If you start to break out on this product, STOP USING IT!", 'author_name': u'donnajeanw'}

I found if I mix it with a tinted SPF (which I didn\xb4t use before since it turned out too dark for my skin tone ) , it does work, and I guess  should be glad now that the bottle will last longer. Bottom line, prepare to really work it into your skin to avoid looking ashy. I tried the Fusion SPF from Skinceuticals on a sample and that one seems much better, with a slight tint that helps it disappear right away. This one is just too white and it shows big time.', 'author_name': u'@TX17'}

{'date': u'2012-06-23', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'One of the Best Sunscreens', 'review_text': u"This sunscreen leaves no sticky residue at all, no grease, and no shine. It really disappears.The only reminder that I have it on my skin is the smell, which bothers me for many hours after I apply the sunscreen. However, I have an unusually strong sense of smell and almost every sunscreen (and perfume, scented hairspray, etc.) bothers me or even gives me a headache. This one's smell is subtle enough that, even though it bothers me, it would probably be fine for most people. It's not perfumey--just a mild chemical smell, like all zinc oxide sunscreens have. I don't think this is enough of a problem to detract a star.it doesn't irritate my sometimes-sensitive skin at all and doesn't aggravate my acne.I really wish they'd make this product in a larger bottle for the body; at this price, it's too expensive to use every day on my face, neck, arms, hands, and legs (if I'm wearing shorts or a skirt.), but I wish I could afford to use it every day.", 'author_name': u'Sylvia71'}

regimen: 1. After cleansing and toning, apply 4-5 drops of Phloretin CF® to face, neck, and chest. Avoid contact with eyes.2. Apply 4-6 drops of Retexturing Activator to face, neck, and chest.3. Apply a small amount of Advanced Pigment Corrector to a dry face and other affected areas.4. Apply a liberal amount of Physical Fusion UV Defense SPF 50 to the entire face, neck and chest.*At night apply a pea-sized amount of Retinol 0.5 to thoroughly cleansed skin. Carefully avoid the eyes and the corners of the eyes. To ensure optimal results, wait at least 30 minutes before applying any corrective or moisturizing products the same evening as applying SkinCeuticals Retinol products. Limit initial use to once or twice a week; gradually increase frequency to every other night, and finally each evening as tolerated.

name: SkinCeuticals A.G.E. Interrupter
description: A.G.E. Interrupter is specifically formulated to improve the creping, thinning appearance of mature skin caused by intrinsic or internal aging processes such as glycation.

Glycation occurs when excess glucose molecules stick to collagen and elastin fibers, eventually binding them together and leading to the formation of Advanced Glycation End-products (A.G.E.). Glycated collagen and elastin fibers lose the ability to function normally, and the body cannot break them down and replace them, which leads to severe wrinkling of the skin.

A.G.E. Interrupter is a unique treatment formulated with 4% Blueberry Extract, 30% Proxylane and 0.2% Phytosphingosine to help prevent the glycation process and correct severe signs of intrinsic aging in mature skin.

reviews: {'date': u'2014-05-22', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u"Best Retinol I've Ever Used", 'review_text': u"I stopped using this product for a few years and BOY did I notice a difference in my skin. {'date': u'2011-07-29', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Love that retinol!', 'review_text': u"I've tried a few high-level retinol creams, and I'm a huge fan of this one. It's hard to beat this price when other 1% retinol creams tend to be at least $75. This little guy has worked wonders in terms of brightening, smoothing, and evening skin tone. The pump is a little weird; all four bottles I've gone through have had this issue, allowing for just a tiny amount per pump. But hey, it comes out, and I suppose that's all that matters. I use a pea-sized amount every evening (sunlight renders retinol inactive) just before bed, and voila, a fresh face ensues. This has a lovely texture as well and smoothes easily over my skin. My skin is pretty hearty, but if yours is more sensitive, starting with a lower-level retinol product would be probably be a good idea. This does what it says it will do--not overnight, but with continued use, the results are obvious and worth the wait!", 'author_name': u'bulldog'}

{'date': u'2010-03-26', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Works great as an occasional treatment.', 'review_text': u"I think Retinol is is one of the few products on the market that actually works. It is quite harsh and I would recommend use only as a spot treatment on dark areas like sun spots, acne spots, hormonal blotches etc. unless you've got some seriously tough skin. It basically peels the top layer of skin off of the area treated and you will get some dry skin & flaking where you use it. You only need a tiny drop, it dispenses a very small amount with a pump, and the bottle lasts a very long time. This is not a permanent treatment of course since sun spots go deep into the skin layers, but it does a better job than microdermabrasion & is less painful. I use this along with the Intense Line Defense & follow up with the Epidermal Repair which is awesome for treated skin. Skinceuticals makes very good products and the prices are not quite as ridiculous as some other brands.", 'author_name': u'lafeeverte'}

{'date': u'2010-03-25', 'rating_score': u'80%', 'rating_title': u'Good Cream, Bad Pump', 'review_text': u'I\'ve tried many different brands of retinol treatments over many years, and, for me, some are amazing, some are average, some are poor. Skinceuticals 1.0 is "average" for me, because it does all the things it\'s supposed to do, but it took longer to get less improvement than I see with others. The thing I noticed the most was that Skinceuticals didn\'t give me the "glow" I get from other retinols. It definitely kept my skin smooth, healthy, plumped, and clear, but it seemed more like maintenance than improvement. I\'ve had 2 bottles where the pump simply quit working after two weeks of use. It\'s hard to get cream out even when the pump does work, so this is probably the worst packaging I\'ve ever seen for a product that creates high expectations.', 'author_name': u'CaliRoseGardener'}

{'date': u'2009-07-16', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'"Retinol Delighted You Found Your Way Back To Me!"', 'review_text': u'This is a class "A" product for those who may use Retinol without it being harsh to their skin.I just started using it in the evenings prior to bedtime before my night moisturiser.(You must wait 30 minutes prior to applying your next creme afterwards.)I was totally surprised with the fragrance and lightness of the creme along with the ease for handling a retinol product.I am originally from Jamaica, West Indies, where we may get Retinol very easily from a physician. so I am rather familiar with the substance itself. (Stateside most insurance companies will not pay for pure Retinol if you over eighteen, unless it is precertified by your company with a physician\'s request.) Even then, many insurers will not pay for it as they know women use it for a beauty treatment which may be quite costly out of pocket.I have used topical cremes and gels in the past, some very well known brands. However, they did not smell all that good and were a bit sticky even though they worked well.With SkinCeuticals, it is amazing how they get the creme to have the consistency and strength combined in an easy pump bottle with the texture and fragrance so pleasant.The trick with retinol is to acclimate your skin to it. I suggest using it as the Brand suggests start off slowly, then increase your applications per week. Since I have used Retinol previously I know what my skin may tolerate. I have had not one day of redness, nor burning sensation and after a week I notice a difference with my wrinkles.The trick is to apply the contents very lightly dab it in gently and give it some time to penetrate the sodimeters of the skin. In my experience, I have had friends who applied it to heavily thinking it would work faster, I feel it is just the opposite. The less you apply until your skin adjusts, the less reddening, peeling and harshness your face will have to experience.I have never had those reactions with Retinol as I use it in small amounts and apply common sense along with the treatment.I beleive this a great product as I said for those who may have the ability to bear the ingredients.I go to a renowned Dermatologist in NYC and his Office only sells high end products. SkinCeuticals is among them and more costly than SkinStore.I went to my physician for medical reasons, not beauty treatments so I never thought to purchase the Retinol there. Now, since I have been in NYC with all the pollution, smokers and dust about I am starting to get a bit of wrinkles I did not have before. So I thought it best to try the Retinol once again Stateside. I am thrilled with the effects so far and highly recommend this item for anyone who wants to renew their skin, NEVERTHELESS, please make sure to follow all the companies advice and you will not regret the purchase.This is another product at SkinStore I found to be priced reasonably, albeit, it is a small bottle, hence, one needs to use a tiny drop each time.', 'author_name': u'iriemango13'}

{'date': u'2008-03-25', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'This is good stuff, but take it slow!', 'review_text': u'I have flushing rosacea, and fair, sun sensitive, sun damaged, hyper sensitive, freckled skin. {'date': u'2006-10-21', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Amazing skin', 'review_text': u"I am fair skinned with naturally auburn hair, and although I have used sunscreen my entire life(concentrating even more beginning in my teenage years on my face,chest and neck), I have started to notice crow's feet and a frown line in between my eyebrows. I am 39. I have tried every over the counter item for wrinkles on the market mainly because it's just fun to try new potions. This one is the real deal. I have only been using it for a week, and have noticed a significant softening of my fine lines. It has also given my skin a radiance I haven't seen in a while. I look refreshed,alert, and renewed! Retinol itself is one on the few ingredients on the market that has objective, scientific proof of its results for over the counter products. The company also tells you right on the bottle just how much retinol is in it, which most do not, many products do have enough in there to make a difference. I tried Botox for awhile, until I found out it is/was tested on animals. I decided I'd rather look old than contribute to the torture of animals. Be prepared to peel until your skin gets used to it. I have tried Retin-A in the past and I feel this to be as good if not better. It is also cheaper. The results are worth it. It is not the least expensive or the most expensive out there, but well worth the money.", 'author_name': u'Jeanna T of Austin, TX'}

{'date': u'2008-07-19', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Impressed after 3 months', 'review_text': u"For the past five years I have been using a wide array of Skinstore's  high end anti-aging, skin refining, and hyperpigmentation treatments, and think I have finally found the combination that produces the best results.  I am 58, and thanks to diligent skin care and sun avoidance (to make up for teen years of damaging sun worship), am easily mistaken for someone in my early 40's.  I use this biogylcolic cream at night, after cleansing with MD Forte II cleanser (also with glycolic acid) and after applying Jan Marini's new Age Intervention Enlighten Serum.  Morning routine is the same, except that I use Age Intervention Face Cream as my moisturizer instead of the bioglycolic cream.  My skin was not wrinkled to begin with, and has remained wrinkle-free well past menopause.  The hyperpigmentation/orange-peel patches that had been showing up on sides of my face are now smoothed out and dramatically fading.  A tiny bit of each product goes a long way.  Those who complain of greasy or sticky feeling are applying way too much.  Nothing is going to work overnight to eliminate what took years to develop, but with conscientious application the results are obvious.", 'author_name': u'Roni'}

{'date': u'2008-05-16', 'rating_score': u'80.0%', 'rating_title': u'Not Bad', 'review_text': u'I am only able to use this product at night because it makes my skin sticky.  After washing it off the next morning my skin is really soft and clear.', 'author_name': u'-V'}

{'date': u'2010-11-22', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Works Like a Charm!', 'review_text': u'Wow! I\'ve used all kinds of glycolic cleaners and others identified for use for sensitive skin and for those with Rosacea. I\'ve never, ever used anything this effective! I then use Pevonia PS2 concentrate and at night use Decleor aroma night rose d\'orient soothing night balm for sensitive skin. My skin showed almost immediate progress! This within days. I had been on prescription medication and tried just about everything - nothing worked. Not until this combination. My skin has lost its rash-like redness and I feel so much better about how I look. Thanks so much! I\'ve just ordered another one and thrown out everything else but these 3 products in my medicine cabinet! regimen: In shower, cleanse skin with a mild cleanser. Pat area dry, but leave slightly damp. It is best to peel one area at a time and a small amount goes a long way. For example, squeeze a small amount of gel from the pouch and spread it thinly over one forearm, upper arm, and shoulder. Quickly begin massaging the area in a circular motion with slightly damp hands. You will feel the polishing sand right away. Continue to massage and the gel peel starts to combine with surface proteins and debris after about 15-20 second so at this stage, you will begin to feel tiny, new solids under the fingertips. This means the peel is activating correctly and the gel is now combining with your dead skin (proteins). Massage for 2-3 minutes or until all of the gel has combined with dead skin. The peel will look and feel slightly foamy. The polishing sand assists with complete removal of the tiny solids from the surface of the skin for smooth, hydrated, velvety skin. Cleanse area peeled again and go on to the next area to be peeled. Remember to pat dry each area and hands to remove excess moisture. Slightly damp hands and skin produce the best results. After peeling, apply rich moisturizer.Warning: This product is a powerful exfoliant designed to remove dead skin. Do not use on the face or on areas where skin is especially thin and test the product on a small area before use to assess sensitivity. After exfoliating, we strongly recommend applying an effective, physical sun block every day, winter and summer. Product contains soy. Do not use on open, excoriated active acne or other open wounds. If redness or irritation occurs, discontinue use.
description: Not for the face. This body exfoliant combines a highly concentrated preparation of the original Real Chemistry Luminous 3 Minute Peel along with polishing sand to assist with complete removal. Its hydrating ingredients and invigorating fragrance will leave your skin soft, refreshed, and luminous, shoulder to toe. Use regularly for gorgeous feet, calves, and legs. Use before a spray tan for an even, long-lasting tan. Treat bikini area before shaving. Enjoy radiant arms, shoulders, hands, and décolleté to look your best in every season and in every outfit.
benefit: Keratosis (tiny bumps) - Eczema (dry patches)

regimen: Please read the entire instruction manual carefully before using the appliance and save the manual for future reference.Place an attachment on the trimmer. Slide the ON / OFF switch to the "on” position. CAUTION: When using the trimmer, DO NOT press the blades or attachments into the skin, as injury may result. DO NOT use this trimmer with a broken or damaged blade or attachment. Use the bikini trimmer attachment to groom the bikini line. Attach the adjustable comb for precision-length trimming. Place the comb onto the trimming attachment by aligning the comb with the attachment head and pushing it down until it snaps into place. To change length settings, slide the raised button on top of the comb until it locks into the desired number. To remove the comb, lift from the side and push up.Use the micro shaver attachment for a close shave on shorter hairs, and to shave over curved areas of the skin. To remove hair, gently slide the shaver over the skin in slow up-and-down movements. Use the precision trimmer attachment to shape and define eyebrows, trim nose hairs and remove single hairs. DO NOT insert trimmer into the nose.Use the facial trimmer attachment to remove ear, neck, upper lip and facial hair. Lightly brush the blade over the area to be trimmed to remove hair. When finished using the trimmer, slide the ON / OFF switch to the "off" position.

reviews: {'date': u'2013-03-06', 'rating_score': u'80.0%', 'rating_title': u'Easy and inexpensive', 'review_text': u"I do like my waxing kit, but it does not melt in the microwave as they say it should. I gave that up after the first time. I put it in a bowl of boiling water and put foil over it all to melt. This process takes 2 - 3 7 minute steams, and then it is melted thoroughly. Once it's melted, it does exactly what it says it will.Other than buying a melting pot that is on all of the time, I think this is easy. I get tired of going to get my lip done all of the time. I use it on my brows from time to time, but I don't have a steady enough hand to feel confident about that.", 'author_name': u'ibwilliamsi'}

{'date': u'2012-03-08', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Best Wax Ever!!', 'review_text': u'I was previously using wax strips, and I got so frustrated with how they always took my skin off! Being someone who never used hot wax, I decided to try this out b/c of the ease of using the microwave (didn\'t really want to have to buy a warmer, b/c lets face it, what girl really needs another piece of equipment taking up room in the bathroom?) & also all of the comments of how gentle the wax is. I am so glad I did!! This stuff is awesome! Yes, it takes a few mintues to get it melted in the microwave, but it\'s totally worth it for the end results! I took an old washcloth & made it my "wax cloth", that way I had a place to set the spreader on after applying the wax & wouldn\'t have to worry about making a mess. I love the fact that you don\'t have to use strips & the blue wax takes off all the hair! And best of all-it\'s so gentle, I haven\'t had any problems w/my skin being ripped off. It is a little pricey, but it you only use it for areas on your face, it is totally a great bang for your buck!!', 'author_name': u'JenP'}

{'date': u'2009-11-20', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'The best hair removel product', 'review_text': u"Poetic Waxing is the best hair removal product I have ever used, and I've tried virtually everything - waxes, sugars, depilatories, epilators, laser, etc. The wax melts at a low temperature so it doesn't burn your skin. I don't what what secret ingredient Bliss uses, but this wax comes off pain free when you remove it quickly, as directed. It also doesn't leave any residue on your skin. regimen: Step 1: Wash and dry the face before starting each treatment. Plug power adapter into wall power outlet. Check to see the LED light has come on the power adapter. Press and HOLD the power button. The device will turn on, and the button/power level light will light up. Your MiniMD is now on the Low power setting. Press the power button again to adjust the suction level to High. We recommend starting with Low Suction Level for at least the first few uses to allow your skin to get accustomed to the treatment.Step 2: With the suction motor running, stroke the diamond tip against the area of skin to be treated. It helps to pull the skin tight or taut with your free hand, especially in hard to treat areas like the nose or where you skin tends to be a little loose like below the jaw or closer to the eye area. Stroke the diamond tip against the skin with smooth, even motions, making sure not to stroke more than 2-3 times in any given area. Treat areas such as the face, neck, chest, arms, hands, feet, or any other body area 2-3 times per week using this method. If it feels comfortable to you, use the higher power level for these other body areas.

description: Big benefits in a little package! All the benefits of salon microdermabrasion in a mini handheld device.

The MiniMD is a compact and convenient tool designed to deliver salon-quality microdermabrasion treatments at a fraction of the cost of in-office appointments. This lightweight and portable glow-getter uses a high tech combination of diamond exfoliation and gentle suction to buff away dead skin cells, revealing the radiant, glowing skin that sits just below the surface. MiniMD safely and effectively reduces the appearance of fine lines, age spots, sun damage and mild scarring. Small enough to fit in your purse, travel case, or gym bag so you can treat your complexion to the transformative benefits of microdermabrasion anywhere, anytime!
Benefits of regular treatments:

regimen: Step 1: AssemblyPlace disc on motor shaft. Simply push on tightly. To remove; PullOff. Important: There are 2 disc sizes. One for the body and onefor the face. See recommended usage below. Place the cap overthe disc. Screw 1/4 turn and seal tight. There must be a seal inorder to create the vacuum and suction. Connect cord to unit andpower supply and plug in.STEP 2: Wash Your SkinCleanse and Wash. Remove all oil, makeup, and dirt. Make sure your hair is out of the way andcovered or pulled back off of your face.STEP 3: TechniquePull skin tight for a smooth surface. Place your fingers on the skin and stretch theskin so that it is tight where the tip will make contact with the skin. Keep the unitmoving constantly over your skin.Do not hover in one spot.Be sure the cap is flush with your skin, maintaining even contact. This will ensure aproper suction. The motor sound will change when suction occurs.Small Disc: Use the small disc around tight spots on the nose or where your boneswill not allow suction. The large disc should only be used on the body and not on theface.STEP 4: TreatmentUse light pressure with early treatments. As you become skilled with this tool you can become moreaggressive and use more pressure. Be careful not to grind to deep. Move the disc in upward andhorizontal motions until you have treated all areas of the surface. If you have trouble spots take alittle more time on these areas. Be careful not to press to hard or stay to long in one place. Keep thedisc moving over the surface or your skin.STEP 5: Cell RenewalCell rejuvenation and renewal serums and creams are essential to the healing process andrecovery. Use your choice of products daily in between treatments.STEP 6: Follow-Up and MaintenanceClean the filter and residue out of the cap and motor shaft. Clean with a damp cloth in andaround motor shaft.Replace discs after every two to three treatments. For maximum effectiveness, the abrasive on thediscs must be fresh.Recommended usage: Once a week.Note: The green disc has a coarse grit for more aggressive treatments. The blue has moderate grit.
name: PMD Personal Microderm Tool Kit
description: Personal microdermabrasion tool comes with two different sizes of disc attachments, offering two different grits for exfoliation. Vacuum action in the tool sucks the skin into the rotating disc, bringing blood flow and collagen to the surface. Removes the thin layer of dead skin cells so that rejuvenation creams and serums can sink deeper into the skin and work more effectively.
Please note this item is a 110V electrical device.

Ladies, you'll want to invest in one of these suckers, trust me!!", 'author_name': u'Heidi33'}

{'date': u'2014-04-04', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Just buy it!', 'review_text': u"Okay, so I'm 40 years old, and I've had issues with oily skin, large pores and clogging since I was nine years old. Let me tell you that I have done it ALL and have spent more money than you'd care to think of: antibiotics at a young age (never do this), topical retinols (still current), laser, subcision for scarring, Accutane (back before I worked in oncology and realized it was a chemo drug- but it did help my cystic acne back in my late teens- I was part of a study group and NO I still don't recommend it), REAL chemical peels that aren't legal in the states, and lots of microderm. I've also used every product in every price range (I currently only recommend Arcona) and yes, I use the Clairsonic and have gone through 3 of them in several years (I keep dropping them) and have learned that I can't live without that one either. The only thing I haven't done is full-on dermabrasion. Will my skin every look unclogged and clear- NO. Do I still break out? As long as I keep up with my regimen- not so much. But the clogged pores? They're for life. And I've got a few on my checks that are starting to look like craters- so frustrating. What helps? TONS OF EXFOLIATION. Because regardless of what others tell you- that's what the problem with the skin is. Will it totally unclog your pores? Not really, but it will help with extractions and will help pore size from growing and worsening when they re-clog (most of us with this skin type don't remain unclogged long).After telling you all of this, I'll tell you that I have a love/hate relationship with microderm. I love that it adds a little extra exfoliation (and I can take A TON). I've typically asked for the MAX when paying for professional treatment because I can deal with pain (it's not that bad- I just have red skin for two days). But I hate that it doesn't last. And it has to be repeated often to see results and the price adds up quickly. With all of the many things I need to spend money on, I don't WANT to spend money on this service.So my dermatologist actually recommended this. And she knows what she's doing. And so I thought, if SHE says it works, I'll easily drop a couple hundred bucks (price of less than 2 treatments). And guess what? It feels the same (though milder and I could probably use this thing far more than recommended). I am ordering the red tips because I know I can take quite a few passes with these. I'll be using this regularly and it's going to save me a whole lot of money. Trust me. This one will save you as well.", 'author_name': u'Lisas365'}

It is very easy to use once you get the hang of it, but it is important to read the instructions carefully and watch the instructional video.I started off with weekly treatments in March, and now I use it about once per month just for basic maintenance.My skin is smoother, and the imperfections that I had are greatly diminished.I also use the PMD skin care products after a treatment, and I really love how the toner cools my skin and reduces the redness and stinging that you can get immediately after a treatment.My only issue is that you do need to keep buying the replacement disks since you can only use them maybe three times before they are no more good. {'date': u'2012-03-02', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Enjoy using the tool', 'review_text': u'I enjoy using this tool. I have it for almost a month. I ordered extra tips for the PMD in blue; green and located the red (coarse) on another website. I felt the price was very reasonable. I would recommend the PMD.', 'author_name': u'blusky15'}

{'date': u'2011-12-10', 'rating_score': u'80.0%', 'rating_title': u'good home use product', 'review_text': u"The results are less aggressive than a professional microderm--probably a good thing so you don't go overboard. Don't think it's realistic to use the heads more than once if doing the whole face. I only gave 3 stars for ease of use bc it was tricky getting the head just right so that it pops up & creates maximum contact with the face--takes some getting used to. Don't hold it in one place (the directions might not be emphatic enough) or it will abrade your skin--don't worry you'll feel it quickly.All in all, a good product, I saw it for 80% off on Groupon.", 'author_name': u'BlackDiamonds'}

{'date': u'2011-12-03', 'rating_score': u'80.0%', 'rating_title': u'Extremely Happy', 'review_text': u"I purchased this product based on the positive reviews, one in particular by another woman who's story was similar to mine: 50+, mild acne scars and large pores from years of outbreaks. While my mother always told me I'd be happy to have oily skin because it would mean fewer wrinkles, and that's true, had I known I'd be battling acne my whole life I might have opted for the wrinkles! But back to the product...As other people have noted, it's important to watch the DVD prior to using. My first pass resulted in a welt, which healed within a few days and that was user error. Otherwise, the anticipated redness, but when the welt and redness had subsided, improvement was absolutely noticeable. I was so excited I wanted to use it much more often than the recommended one time per week but restrained myself. After 3 treatments, my skin looks better than it has in years, and breakouts are less frequent probably due to a deeper cleaning/getting ride of lingering bacteria. The only thing that kept me from rating this 5 stars is simply that I have nothing to compare it to. One last thing regarding other peoples' comments on the discs only lasting for 3 treatments: I just rub two discs together--they're pumice or sandpaper after all, so they're meant to erode surfaces--then clean thoroughly. By doing so, got off any remaining gook from the heads of the discs and am able to make them last a bit longer.", 'author_name': u'MissTK'}

{'date': u'2011-10-18', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Great at-home microdermabrasion', 'review_text': u'I originally wanted to try an at-home microdermabrasion tool because of an infomercial I saw featuring a competing brand. The reviews for the other brand always pointed out how it broke after a few months. Then I found PMD available for MUCH cheaper than the competing brand, plus it was on sale here at Skin Store for $50 less than normal. I ordered it immediately, and I haven\'t regretted it since.I\'ve never had a professional microderm treatment, so I cannot compare the two. But for my purposes, the tool works incredibly well. If you use it as instructed, you should have smoother skin after only a few weeks. I did receive a few compliments from people who couldn\'t quite place what changed, they just said I had some sort of "glow" or softness that wasn\'t there before.My understanding is that this device must be used in tandem with some sort of skin renewal cream or serum for maximum effect, so that is what I\'ve been doing. The point of removing that top layer of skin is to allow your other beauty products to penetrate more readily. My pores appear minimized, my skin is more even/smoother, and I have fewer blackheads. I LOVE it.The replacement discs may seem expensive, but you can use each disc up to three times and maybe more depending on how much skin you are covering with one disc. You also receive a total of 6 discs in each replacement package (3 small, 3 large), so each time you use it on your face costs about $0.83 (not including the cost of the tool itself). I\'m more than willing to pay just over $3 a month for these results without leaving my home.', 'author_name': u'keahi85'}

{'date': u'2011-10-14', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Love it!!', 'review_text': u"I have never felt compelled to review a product before but this thing is amazing. I have used it only 3 times and the difference in my complexion is huge. It takes some practice to figure out how to use it but if you follow the directions to the letter it's very easy. My skin tone is much more even. This tool has dramatically lightened or removed dark spots from acne and also blotches from sun damage that have bothered me for years. People tell me I look great but they don't know what is different. I love it and I highly recommend.", 'author_name': u'Molly715'}

{'date': u'2011-10-09', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Give it a try!', 'review_text': u'My situation: I\'ve just completed my fourth weekly treatment with my Personal Microderm. I\'m 66 years old, have a few wrinkles, some adult acne and some whiteheads. My dermatologist has me using generic Retin-A, which has helped the acne somewhat. I\'ve never had a professional microdermabrasion treatment. The PMD was on sale, so decided to give it a try, after reading tons of reviews.I\'m very happy with the results so far. My skin is softer and clearer, and the whiteheads are beginning to disappear. I use the blue tips (for more sensitive skin).Here\'s what I would advise:1. Go VERY easy the first time you use it, I can\'t emphasize "EASY" enough!2. Practice first on some "tougher" skin, like your leg or arm. It takes a while to get the knack of using the tool. It has pretty good suction, more than I thought, and this makes it more difficult to keep the tool moving. The longer you stay in one spot, the more it abrades -- trust me on that!3. As I mentioned above, keep the tool moving, don\'t stay in one spot. And the first time you use it, go over each area ONCE. After the first time, it will be easier to use.4. Make absolutely sure you use a toner that is as close to ALCOHOL-FREE as you can get! I used a Sea Breeze type toner the first time, and my face burned for hours! I now use L\'Oreal\'s Alcohol Free toner (inexpensive and available at Wal-Mart) and it\'s wonderful!The first time I used it, I did an awful job and ended up with a burning, red face, plus some scabs and then my face peeled. Some of the other reviewers had the same experience. Since then, I have done just fine and have had no problems. I still use the blue tips, but now I can go over "problem" areas more than once and I know how to keep the tool moving.I\'m going to use it once a week for a while, until I have the finished results I want. It\'s a well made tool and yes, it works!', 'author_name': u'jodeg1945'}

{'date': u'2011-09-09', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'I love this thing!!!', 'review_text': u'I have used this microdermabrasion tool for about 3 weeks now.
