{'date': u'2010-09-02', 'rating_score': u'80%', 'rating_title': u"Best Home Microdermabrasion I've Tried", 'review_text': u'This product by far is the most superior home microdermabrasion I\'ve ever tried. I have oily skin and live in a very humid environment and frequent dermabrasion keeps my skin in check. The suction of the device works very well and the abrasion discs visibly abrade the skin and remove the outer layer in a similar fashion to what you would experience in a professional treatment. It\'s not a very intense dermabrasion but the ease of use and cost benefit for frequent users more than make up for any cosmetic difference. As far as it being "flimsy" as another user described it, I\'m not sure what they\'re referring to. The product seems well constructed and sturdy but not something that you want to be tossing around carelessly. If you take care of it as you would any other normal electronic device I wouldn\'t anticipate any problems. The only drawback of the product and the reason I am giving it a 4 instead of a 5 is because of the abrasion discs. They work at most for 3 treatments and need to be replaced at regular intervals in order to be effective. They seem relatively cheap and simple but they\'re 15 dollars a pop for replacements. If they\'d substantially increase the number of discs included per replacement set, I\'d give it 5 stars.', 'author_name': u'MaleProductJunkie'}

regimen: Step 1: Super Acids X-treme Acid Rush Peel: For best results, use twice weekly. Apply 3 pumps onto a cleansed face and neck. Leave on for 10-15 minutes before rinsing thoroughly with lukewarm water.Avoid eye contact. If eye contact occurs, rinse well with lukewarm water. Do not use on irritated skin, discontinue use if irritation occurs. If irritation develops or persists, consult a health care practitioner. This product may make your skin more sensitive to the sun, use adequate sunscreen protection whilst using this product and for a week after you discontinue use. Step 2: Super Acids Hangover Mask: Apply once a week on clean skin to the face and neck avoiding the eye area. Leave to dry for a minimum of 5 minutes. Rub off gently with fingertips until most of the mask is gone, then wash off any residue with lukewarm water. Avoid eye contact. Discontinue use if skin irritation develops or increases. If irritation develops or persists, consult a health care practitioner. Step 3: Super Acids After Party Scrub: Gently massage on damp skin avoiding the eye contour area. Rinse with lukewarm water. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use on children under 3 years old. Do not use on peeling or irritated skin. Use sun screen during daytime.

description: The Seal of Recommendation is granted to products that provide effective UV sun protection and safely aid in the prevention of sun-induced damage to the skin.

This beautiful yellow mousse smoothes on like velvet and sets to absolute perfection. The yellow colore hides red discolorationwhile the active ingredients promote the actual reduction of redness in the skin. Colorescience Line Tamer SunReliable Primer will help the skin look soothed, not stressed, after extractions, glycolic treatments, peels, and microdermabrasion.* It also helps keep skin cool which is important for calming many skin problems. It is recommended for all types of redness issues such as rosacea and acne. With this amazing texture, you can erasepores, smooth fine lines and mattify shine. Colorescience Line Tamer acts like a “spackle” to fill in lines and wrinkles, and is perfect to even out skin tone compromised by sun exposure, wind exposure and aggressive skin care treatments. Packed full of powerful antioxidants and “good for your skin” ingredients, Colorescience Line Tamer will brighten your skin instantly. (Contains zinc oxide and oats, both classified as category one skin protectants. Safe enough for a baby’s bottom.)

{'date': u'2011-01-06', 'rating_score': u'60.0%', 'rating_title': u'Almost great', 'review_text': u"If the fragrances in Noxzema bother you, you probably won't like this primer. {'date': u'2012-09-27', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Comforting', 'review_text': u'I am surprised that Jurlique did not name this a comfort cream because it definitely made my face feel so much better. {'date': u'2011-05-06', 'rating_score': u'40.0%', 'rating_title': u"I don't like this one - GREASY AND STINKY!", 'review_text': u'I ordered this cream along with a few others to try when Decleor changed all their formulations / discontinued the one I liked. The smell of this cream is AWFUL!! It could very well be the best moisturizer created EVER, and I still would never order it again. It smells like someone\'s elderly grandmother\'s perfume. ACK!It\'s also very greasy (which I really don\'t mind since my skin is oh so dry), but I know most people don\'t like that so I wanted to let you know.It\'s also VERY expensive and discounts cannot be applied.It\'s also in one of those "metal" tubes so it gets all wrinkled and folded when you are trying to get the product out. I\'ll eventually have to cut it up to get out the rest.I will still use it; it\'s too expensive to throw away. I keep it in my car in case I leave the house and forget my moisturizer (sometimes I tone, put some oil on, and then forget the creme before I leave!). I also use it on my hands, but it\'s even really too greasy for them as well - it\'s all over my steering wheel now!Hope this helps you decide if you want to purchase it.', 'author_name': u'kbMA'}

reviews: {'date': u'2012-04-24', 'rating_score': u'20.0%', 'rating_title': u'Yuck.', 'review_text': u'for starters, it is pretty expensive, for the quality of scent you get. i have always been a fan of jurlique, and decided to take a risk on the jasmine scent, due to the overwhelmingly lovely rose scent this brand puts out with their products. my local sephora stopped selling jurlique products recently, so i bought the jasmine lotion/shower gel from this site without testing the scent first. big mistake.unfortunately, it does not smell a thing like jasmine. and i can even go as far to say that, after a few hours of wearing the product, it actually smells BAD. i cannot describe what it smells like, but it is a truly unpleasant odor.it is also very thin. watery, even. it is not too bad in terms of moisturizing, but since it is so thin, i probably over-apply because i am afraid it spreads too thinly. then, i really do feel like i smell bad. :( what a mistake. sticking to what i know and love from jurlique, and that is their rose scent. never again with the jasmine. not a thing like true jasmine. yuck yuck yuck!', 'author_name': u'chuu'}

{'date': u'2014-11-15', 'rating_score': u'60.0%', 'rating_title': u'Rose-Scented Alcohol Rub', 'review_text': u'First, the positives: this is the best scent I have ever smelled in a rose lotion. I have tried many: L\'Occitane, Ren Moroccan Rose Otto, Crabtree and Evelyn, Diptyque, Jo Malone... I love the lightweight property of this lotion, and how it absorbed well. But later my skin was tight and dry, and my cuticles began to crack as I used it more frequently. It turns out that SD Alcohol 40 is listed as the 5th ingredient! I believe that it adds to the "perfume sillage" of the lotion, but this type of alcohol should never be used frequently on skin; it causes inflammation and disrupts the skin\'s natural barrier. Not recommended.', 'author_name': u'Amarie121'}

Especially during the winter months in the Northeast USA, where I live, when facial skin gets irritated from harsh weather winter fabrics, and changes in temperature, rose is a natural calming agent.It is also good after sun exposure. Also, I use it after facial waxing and sometimes spray it on my husband's face after he has shaved and moisturized, at the first sign of redness. The natural fragrance is heavenly - very light, genuine rose and smells like angels showered my face with rose essence. I chose the spray bottle to attain the fine mist. Although I have never tried this brand before, I took a chance and am very pleased with the overall quality. I have used rose syrup in the past for facial breakouts and rashes, but this product is sufficient for everyday use. Works well before bedtime, and on a cold, windy day I use it as a finish to further protect my skin from winter conditions.", 'author_name': u'nechama'}

Smart Design: Easy to use with a single button interface, 2 adjustable speeds and 100% waterproof.

Travel Friendly: Up to 300 uses per charge = charge your device once every 5 months.
description: The LUNA mini is a revolutionary facial-cleansing device. Combining sophisticated T-Sonic™ pulsations with a gentle silicone brush, the LUNA mini provides deep yet gentle cleansing, leaving your complexion looking clearer, brighter and healthier.

The non-porous brush is bacteria resistant and up to 35 times more hygienic than standard nylon brush heads. The LUNA mini's three-zone brush is suitable for all skin types and has over 1,300 touch points to draw out impurities for a glowing and radiant complexion. This powerful device gently removes dead skin cells and unclogs pores of dirt, oil and makeup residue to reveal more vibrant, even-toned skin.
Designed to fit in the palm of your hand, the LUNA mini requires no replacement brushes, has two adjustable intensities and can be used up to five months after one full charge.

regimen: Use once a day, at night for normal/dry skin types. Use twice a day, morning and night for congested skins. Massage a small amount onto the face and neck onto dry skin over the grime and makeup from the day. Fill the basin with hot water and immerse the Muslin Cloth. Squeeze off excess water and hold the cloth over the face and neck for a few seconds while taking a deep breath. The heat will soften the skin and open the pores allowing the aromatic oils to cleanse the skin of impurities. For optimum results repeat this stage three times. Fold the hot, rinsed cloth into a square and work it in small circular movements across the face and neck to remove all traces of Cleanser and makeup. Finally rinse the cloth in cool water and hold over the face and neck.
name: Eve Lom Cleanser 100ml
description: The Eve Lom Cleanser was described by Vogue as "probably the best cleanser in the world" and is the foundation of the Eve Lom skincare regimen. With the cleanser's signature blend of four aromatic plant oils, specially woven 100% cotton Muslin Cloth and quick routine, the result is incredibly glowing, radiant skin with a smoother, more refined texture. The difference can be seen instantly and just keeps on improving with use.

description: This three-dimensional treatment contains a unique combination of ingredients to dramatically improve severe signs of intrinsic aging around the eyes in mature skin.

Immediately, optical diffusers improve radiance and minimize the appearance of dark circles and capillaries. Within four to twelve weeks, a complex of flavonoids and synergistic peptides strengthens blood vessel walls, improves lymphatic drainage, and eliminates hemoglobin’s colored end-products to dramatically improve dark circles and puffiness. By twelve weeks and beyond, blueberry extract interrupts the formation of advanced glycation end-products (A.G.E.) and Proxylane restores water and nutrient content to the dermal epidermal junction (D.E.J.) to increase skin elasticity and thickness for dramatic improvement of wrinkles and crow's feet.

{'date': u'2012-03-11', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Winner!', 'review_text': u"I admit it: I'm way too obsessed with trying out new skin care products, even when I find one that works well, so it speaks volumes when I actually stick with one. I've stuck with this for almost two years, which is a record for me, because it absolutely does what it says. It's a little pricey, but you really need such a teeny tiny bit as it's very rich while still feeling light. So, that's my humble opinion. benefit: Has a suede texture that fits the contours of the face.
Helps to eliminate visible lines and streaks.
Non-allergenic, latex free and fragrance free.
description: The unique shape and exclusive material available only with Beautyblender ensures impeccable, streak-free application with minimum product waste. Use with primer, foundation, powder, cream blush and any other complexion product.

Beautyblender features an open cell structure that fills with small amounts of water when wet. This allows the sponge to be “full” so that the makeup product sits on top of the sponge rather than being absorbed into the sponge, allowing you to use less product every time. When wet, Beautyblender doubles in size and becomes even softer, returning to its original size when it air dries.

description: Uncompromising power delivered in pure luxury and uniquely designed with ultra-soft bristles, this facial replacement brush head effectively cleanses skin with extreme fluid action. The Cashmere Cleanse Brush Head will gently but powerfully cleanse even the driest and most mature skin types, leaving skin feeling smooth, supple and younger looking. Ultra soft, incredibly gentle with anti-aging benefits, this brush still cleanses 6x better than hands alone but also improves hydration for drier skin!

The long tapered bristles on this high performance brush head offer an efficacious, luxury experience. The combination of oscillation with extreme fluid forces yields powerful cleansing results while increasing the skin's natural hydration levels. Ideal for aging and sensitive skin, this brush head's high foaming action turns any foaming cleanser into an unforgettable experience.

description: The LUNA mini is a revolutionary facial-cleansing device. Combining sophisticated T-Sonic™ pulsations with a gentle silicone brush, the LUNA mini provides deep yet gentle cleansing, leaving your complexion looking clearer, brighter and healthier.

The non-porous brush is bacteria resistant and up to 35 times more hygienic than standard nylon brush heads. The LUNA mini's three-zone brush is suitable for all skin types and has over 1,300 touch points to draw out impurities for a glowing and radiant complexion. This powerful device gently removes dead skin cells and unclogs pores of dirt, oil and makeup residue to reveal more vibrant, even-toned skin.
Designed to fit in the palm of your hand, the LUNA mini requires no replacement brushes, has two adjustable intensities and can be used up to five months after one full charge.

regimen: Start by producing enough foam to apply to your skin. Lightly massage in your hands for 30 seconds until a nice foam has been worked up and then apply foam to your face and leave on for one to two minutes. Rinse thoroughly with warm water and pat dry. You will start to see results after about a week of use.You may feel a slight tingling sensation while the foam is on your face or find that your skin becomes a little dry during the first days of use. Don’t worry, this is normal. Simply reduce the length of time that the foam is left on your face until your skin adjusts to the soap.Storage of Cor Silver Soap:Due to the active natural ingredients in Cor, the soap bar can break down when in contact with moisture in the air. Do not leave your Cor bar uncovered in the shower or on a washstand, as the bar can melt. Wrap in plastic wrap or store in an enclosed soap dish. This is especially important in humid climates.
name: Cor Soap - 30g
description: Cor, the Silver Soap™ is a convenient, single-step process that cleanses and works effectively to achieve wonderful results for your facial skin. The particles of Cor soap’s active ingredients, including silver, sericin, collagen and chitosan, are dramatically reduced in size, reaching deep below the surface, killing bacteria, minimizing wrinkles, moisturizing and feeding vital nutrients to the skin. This one product clears up the skin, removes makeup, evens out the skin tone, fades sun spots, maintains the skin's natural moisture factor, replenishes lost collagen and has UV protection.
With Cor you simply lather up, wait a few minutes and the job's done. Foam... rinse... glow...™
Cor is suitable for every skin type. Cor's mild pH level of 7.2 means it's just as effective on troubled acne skin as it is on the most delicate and sensitive skin.
Travel size also available.
reviews: {'date': u'2015-02-06', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'The best face wash ever!', 'review_text': u"I have always struggled with problem skin - adult acne, large pores, blackheads, etc. My skin is sensitive, so harsh treatments only make my problems worse. {'date': u'2011-12-29', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Pretty Great', 'review_text': u"I stopped taking the pill at age 39 after being on it for the last 15+ years and I guess it was the only thing that was keeping my skin clear. My medium bar is now the size of a contact lens and I handle it like it's gold : )", 'author_name': u'GeorgiaClay'}

It only took a small amount of water and a few rubs of the soap to get a lot of the product working. This is a good thing because the soap ball itself is very small. Think golf ball size. I have very sensitive skin and was worried about a reaction, but I had none. Just incredibly soft and clear skin.', 'author_name': u'Alamb'}

{'date': u'2011-03-05', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u"It's all true: Cor Soap is fabulous", 'review_text': u'I am 45, still have some acne and oily skin issues. plus some melasma (brown pigmentation) across the forehead., nose and cheeks for some reason. Cor Soap helps to reduce the melasma and works well at really getting my skin clean. I use my Nutra Sonic (a cheaper version of Clarisonic) to wash my face with this soap. It lathers up very well and cleans very deeply. In just a few days, I can see smaller -pores and my skin is beginning to glow. I would highly recommend this product to anyone struggling with acne, enlarged pores, oily skin or hyperpigmentation. It is actually milder than one would expect, though it does have a drying effect. Definitely a winner! It lathers easily and is very simple to use.', 'author_name': u'thinker1'}

{'date': u'2011-03-04', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Indescribable', 'review_text': u"First of all, I am not a person who likes bar soap for my face, so I was a bit skeptical. I do not know what is in this stuff, but it has my face glow like I've never seen. Dramatic improvement in fine lines. I can't live without it! If I don't use it, I notice a difference throughout the day in my appearance. The only slight drawback is a faint greyish tinge it leaves on my skin that can easily be covered with makeup/blush (no doubt from the silver). However the way your skin looks outweighs it. You just have to experience it and you'll see what everyone is talking about.", 'author_name': u'SRBMiami'}

description: The LUNA mini is a revolutionary facial-cleansing device. Combining sophisticated T-Sonic™ pulsations with a gentle silicone brush, the LUNA mini provides deep yet gentle cleansing, leaving your complexion looking clearer, brighter and healthier.

The non-porous brush is bacteria resistant and up to 35 times more hygienic than standard nylon brush heads. The LUNA mini's three-zone brush is suitable for all skin types and has over 1,300 touch points to draw out impurities for a glowing and radiant complexion. This powerful device gently removes dead skin cells and unclogs pores of dirt, oil and makeup residue to reveal more vibrant, even-toned skin.
Designed to fit in the palm of your hand, the LUNA mini requires no replacement brushes, has two adjustable intensities and can be used up to five months after one full charge.

description: If you really want to do something great for your skin then try the Mio Body Brush by Mio Skincare. With natural boar bristles, rubber massage nodules and sustainable bamboo this brush lets you massage, exfoliate and promote circulation in as little as 3 minutes per use. LB

Start at soles of your feet and work your way up the body using upward strokes. Always brush in the direction of your heart. When brushing your stomach and chest use clockwise sweeps following the direction of your digestive system.
Pay special attention to backs of thighs or areas where you have cellulite.

The pressure used should be? stimulating enough to increase circulation but gentle on your skin. You should see a rosy flush to the areas you have brushed. It’s good to try and give a minimum of 3 minutes for this whole body brushing, ideally 3 times a week.

description: The LUNA mini is a revolutionary facial-cleansing device. Combining sophisticated T-Sonic™ pulsations with a gentle silicone brush, the LUNA mini provides deep yet gentle cleansing, leaving your complexion looking clearer, brighter and healthier.

The non-porous brush is bacteria resistant and up to 35 times more hygienic than standard nylon brush heads. The LUNA mini's three-zone brush is suitable for all skin types and has over 1,300 touch points to draw out impurities for a glowing and radiant complexion. This powerful device gently removes dead skin cells and unclogs pores of dirt, oil and makeup residue to reveal more vibrant, even-toned skin.
Designed to fit in the palm of your hand, the LUNA mini requires no replacement brushes, has two adjustable intensities and can be used up to five months after one full charge.

description: Experience a luxurious shower with pure water for clinically proven, healthy hair. The T3 Source Shower Filter Hand-Held removes damaging chlorine from shower water which helps to improve hair health, hair color retention and skin appearance.

Washing your hair is the first step in your hair care routine. Regular household water often contains such a high level of chlorine that it damages the appearance and health of hair. Washing your hair frequently increases your exposure to chlorine.

Through a chemical filtration process known as “Redox”, the T3 Source Shower Filter Hand-Held transforms chlorine into harmless elements that are too large to be absorbed by hair and skin. In fact, patented technology effectively removes more chlorine over a broader temperature range than other similar filters, resulting in:

, a compact, travel-friendly facial-cleansing device designed to provide a professional standard of skincare with its invigorating one-minute ritual. Specially tailored to treat normal skin, the facial brush inspires a healthier-looking complexion; helping to gently clear and clarify for a luminous glow.

Combining T-Sonic™ Pulsation Technology with soft, specially customised silicone touch-points, the device gently yet effectively cleanses and exfoliates with a single intensity; its varying soft, non-porous touch points perform an effective cleanse on skin, lifting away dirt, oil and makeup residue for a fresher complexion. Flexible and easy to use, the silicone 'bristles' are ultra-hygienic and resist bacteria build-up to keep skin fresh and clean.

Embedded with a high-technology Anti-Ageing Mode, the cleanser directs lower-frequency pulsations to wrinkle-prone areas to help smooth and firm the appearance of skin. 100% waterproof, the device is safe for use in the bath or shower. Complete with a travel pouch to keep it clean and ready to use.

regimen: The world’s first edgeless, non-disposable, hi-definition cosmetic sponge applicator. The unique shape and exclusive material available only with Beautyblender ensures impeccable, streak-free application with minimum product waste. Use with primer, foundation, powder, cream blush and any other complexion product.Beautyblender features an open cell structure that fills with small amounts of water when wet. This allows the sponge to be “full” so that the makeup product sits on top of the sponge rather than being absorbed into the sponge, allowing you to use less product every time. When wet, Beautyblender doubles in size and becomes even softer, returning to its original size when it air dries.Blendercleanser is a lightly lavender-scented cleanser that’s free of dyes and skin irritants. It’s soothing soy-based, low-suds formula breaks down rapidly, making it earth-friendly and fun to use. This cleanser supports the integrity of the blender as well as removes excess residue and germs for a clean makeup application.

description: Achieve a younger looking complexion with the
from
. Boasting a variety of best-selling,
anti-ageing products, the set combines the

Mini Facial Toning device with a unique primer and serum to create an effective skincare routine that will result in a more youthful look. Elasticity and suppleness is visibly improved, whilst the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles is reduced.

The NuFACE Mini boasts all the benefits of a microcurrent treatment, but is packed into a petite and portable travel-friendly device. Designed as a solution to the visible signs of ageing, the device works to stimulate the large surface areas of the face, creating similar results to a facelift, however the treatment is pain free and takes only 5 minutes.

Mircrocurrent devices mimic the natural current of the body, which slows as we age. Going deeper than the surface, the toning device visibly tones the facial muscles, improving the contour, visibly evening skin tone and reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Safe and effective for all skin types,
Mini leaves the complexion looking more youthful and visibly supple.
Prepare for the

Mini with the Gel Primer. The lightweight formula allows for the device to glide across the skin easily, whilst ensuring maximum microcurrent conductivity for optimum results. Suitable for all skin types, the formula is water-based and extremely easy to remove.

The bestselling Collagen Booster Serum encourages a visible tightening and firming effect on the skin by stimulating collagen production in the face. The complexion’s natural glow is restored and mature and lacklustre skin appears more youthful, even and radiant.

Enriched with Copper Peptide, the Infusion Serum promotes skin healing, whilst a blend of Hydrocotyl and Coneflower extract work harmoniously to maintain and improve the suppleness of skin. Delivering hydration, the serum also boasting moisturising properties due to Panthenol.
ingredient: Gel Primer: Water, 1, 2 Propanediol, Acrylic Acid Polymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Methylisothiazolinone, Cellulose Polymer.Collagen Serum: Water (Aqua), Lecithin, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Beta-Sitosterol, Linolenic Acid, Tocopherol, Sodium Ascorbate, Mannitol, Butylene Glycol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Echinacea Purpurea Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Panthenol, Yeast Polysaccharides, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Decarboxy Carnosine HCL, Copper PCA, Disodium EDTA.

description: The Deep Pore Cleansing Brush Head uses an advanced dual-action motion to effectively cleanse oily skin, large pores, and those hard-to-reach or uneven areas of the face, such as around the nose.

Compatible with all Clarisonic Sonic Skin Cleansing models, the Deep Pore Cleansing Brush Head is an ideal complement to your current brush head and can be incorporated into your cleansing regimen when your skin seems particularly oily or in need of a deep pore cleansing. It is safe and gentle for use twice a day if you're prone to large pores or consistently oily skin.
To keep your brush head clean, simply rinse the brush head with antibacterial soap and warm water. We recommend replacing your Clarisonic brush head every 2-3 months.

description: Safe for use on acne-prone skin, the Acne Cleansing Brush Head features extra-plush bristle gradation that delivers concentrated flushing of the pores. Velvet-like bristle tips are uniquely textured to provide an ultra-gentle cleansing action on sensitive, compromised skin.

To mount the brush head, align the three notches with the three pins on the handle, then push down and twist clockwise. Do not use the Clarisonic Brush Head to remove eye makeup. To keep your brush head clean, simply rinse the brush head with antibacterial soap and warm water. Clarisonic recommends replacing your brush head every 2-3 months.
These Clarisonic replacement brush heads can be used with any of the Clarisonic devices.

{'date': u'2014-12-21', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'One of two best products EVER (and I try a lot)', 'review_text': u"There are two beauty products that I have ever tried that have transformed my appearance (I have had professional treatments that have, but that's another story).The first is a tourmaline-infused straightening iron- goodbye frizzies, hello sleek, beautiful hair!The second is this product. (Actually, the Clarisonic Mia also rocks-need the one with the sensitive brushhead, but it cleans pores like nobody's business).So, I have a milestone birthday coming up and I mega-splurged and bought this product.I had been using the Mia for about 2 weeks, and it lessened sebaceous hyperplasia, but certainly didn't make it go away.All derms and estheticians will tell you that ONLY a dermatologist can get rid of sebaceous hyperplasia, so this is really, really amazing!The first time, yes the FIRST time, that I used the TNS the sebaceous hyperplasia dissapeared. I was SHOCKED and do NOT think others should use this with the same expectations.(But remember, I had already diminished the hyperplasia with the Mia).Been using for about a week since that time.Already, my skin is noticeably more even, I had a few milia and it is making them go away and it is even helping with wrinkling just under my chin that resulted from Ultherapy (super expensive, super painful medical procedure that did nothing but cause this neck problem).The one thing I do not like about this product is, possibly because it has alcohol in it (fairly high up in ingredient list- why, SkinMedica, why?)I can't use the 1% retinol product that I was using.I do have sensitive skin (and the Mia makes it more sensitive), but I think this would be an issue for most people.I decided that for now I'd rather use this, but I may at some time go to a lower strength retinol and alternate use of it and the TNS.Also, I have oily skin, so it's no problem for me that it's slightly drying (very slightly), but someone with dry skin would definitely have to use a good moisturizer over it.I am only using it once a day because I tried it in the day and it IS kind of sticky. Funny, but don't notice that at night.Overall, I am honestly blown away by what a product that you can purchase on the internet can deliver.One last thing, you can actually get it for like $100 less, but I don't trust that you are getting the real deal (there are reviews to that effect to). For this kind of money, you need to know that you are getting what you pay for.", 'author_name': u'StephieF'}

reviews: {'date': u'2014-09-23', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Love It', 'review_text': u"Ever since I came off the pill a year ago, I have been dealing with horrible cystic acne all over my face. I have been able to keep my acne at bay through a combination of antibiotics and retinoids. However, that regimen of mine has proven itself to be quite harsh on my skin since my face would always peel and feel dry. I have been looking for a cleanser that would be gentle on my skin yet exfoliate and clean it thoroughly. That cleanser is God sent. After using it my face feels clean and moisturized and I'm left with that healthy glow that I adore. No more irritated skin. It has that herbal smell that is so refreshing. It doesn't lather much which might be a deal breaker for some but I am okay with it. My only complaint is its price. However a little goes a long way. If you plan on using that product only on your face than it should last more than 2 months. But if you plan on using it all over your body like I do, then be ready to shed 36 bucks every month or so.", 'author_name': u'Ninaan'}

reviews: {'date': u'2015-02-22', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Do you believe in miracles?', 'review_text': u'I never experienced acne issues until this past year. Hormonal cystic acne to be exact & its the worst kind around, and my relationship with my skin has been quite rocky and I have been dying to find something to keep it at bay, or if nothing else, reduce my frustrations with it.While I was in England my friend had me try her acne cream, Quinoderm, her Doctor boyfriend prescribes her. It worked wonders and my skin was fab the 2 weeks I was there. Sadly, this is not available in the US, even with a prescription, so my quest for something "that worked" began and ended almost as fast as it started.I chose this item because it contains 10% benzoyl peroxide.("Acne treatments" containing salicylic & lactic acid aren\'t acne treatments nor will it do anything for cystic acne.) 24 hours ago I applied it on a new pea size bump & it is gone. The golf-ball size bump has shrank down to the size of a marble. The pit & scarring a still healing cyst left behind 4 months ago looks 100 times better. I am beside myself with relief!!This does not have a medicine smell. A teeny tiny drop goes A LONG way. It is smooth & creamy, not watery or thick or grainy. It is white & absorbs into your skin quickly so spot treat away during the day!I have not had an issues with skin discoloration, hair bleaching, or towel bleaching.I have oily skin in summer & combo dry in winter. With the unusually warm winter we are having my skin has gone bonkers. Most true OTC acne products dry my skin out within minutes. I was hesitant to try this but am glad I did. So far, this has not been an issue. Should it become one I\'ll still use it. Cystic acne is quite painful & large & will stick around FOR MONTHS. The only true cure for it is to have it cut out. But who wants that done on their face? Not me. Until my hormones are brought under control I will have to deal with it. Fortunately I have something in my arsenal to make it easier to deal.', 'author_name': u'flynnsmom'}

{'date': u'2012-08-23', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Really clears blemishs quickly', 'review_text': u"I mix the Anti Bac Clearing Lotion with Kate's Goat Milk Cream at night and I wake up with clear and smooth skin. {'date': u'2008-11-04', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Extraordinary Cleanser', 'review_text': u'I have been fighting breakouts, black heads, and large pores pretty much all my life.   The only time I have not had problems with breakouts, black heads,oily skin, and large pores is when I use this product.   I started using this product when I was 23 years old and now 43 years old I continue to use it.   Now---its not necessarily used for breakouts but its deep cleansing has prevented fine wrinkles to develop on my face and prevents them.   Only a drop is needed to clean your entire face....and a bottle can last up to 3-6 months.   Yes, I have "tried" other products but nothing compares to it.  There is no residue like some other products have after using it on your face which further exasperates pores, clogs pores= black heads, and will eventually cause "heightened" breakouts.  With a wash cloth not only do you wash off the lather but you can literally see ALL the oil and dead skin cells that have been removed from your face--your face feels fresh, rejuvenated, and soft (without the superficial ingredients of other products to make it seem so).    Having large pores I never considered my skin to be soft but when I use this  within a week my large pores are barely visible and my skin becomes smooth, supple, and soft to the touch. Yeah! Also recommend using the MD Formulations Acne Gel as well along with this product to get maximum benefits.  LOVE IT AND CAN\'T LIVE WITHOUT IT!', 'author_name': u'Maddy'}

{'date': u'2008-02-19', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Highly Recommend!', 'review_text': u"I've had really oily skin with monthly acne breakouts for EVER.  I have been on everything - Retin-A, Accutane, you name it.  I had used Clinique for years (Oily Soap, Type 3 Clarifying Lotion, Moist. Gel) and it did absolutely nothing for my skin.  I switched to this by accident (I had gone out of town and forgot all of my skincare stuff).  I bought the acne starter kit and I saw results within a week.  My skin never gets oily anymore, in fact it tends to be on the drier side.  I definitely have fewer breakouts and when I do it's one or two pimples, and THEY ARE GONE THE NEXT DAY!  Use it morning and night, with the acne gel and the light serum and you will see results!", 'author_name': u'Bristol'}

{'date': u'2007-05-17', 'rating_score': u'80.0%', 'rating_title': u'pretty good', 'review_text': u'i have used this product for two weeks. i have less acnes than before, but maybe it has has to do the chinese herbs i started to take a week ago.but anyway this product is good. one thing needs to mention is, how much lather a cleanser produces is not a factor to decide it is  a good cleanser or not, and in fact, if it gives to much foam, it is actually bad.', 'author_name': u'rochelle'}

{'date': u'2006-12-18', 'rating_score': u'80.0%', 'rating_title': u'Still Not Tough Enough', 'review_text': u'This product is a good product, but it was not the perfect solution for acne as everyone stated it to be.  I have extremely oily skin and suffer from breakouts on the sides of my forehead.  The breakouts are typically underneath the skin and painful.  However, the rest of my face is pretty much clear.  Currently, I am on Rosula and Triaz 6% pads, which are good prescriptions, however their full effectiveness would depend on a good cleanser.  The only thing that worked was "Clean and Clear" 10% BP wash.  This product is still a good product since it did tighten my skin and reduced the oil on my face, but the acne slightly worsened as I substituted this product as my main cleanser.  It is still a solid product, but it definitely needs improvement.  Perhaps more foaming action would do the trick.  After all, it is for oily skin.', 'author_name': u'Rudy'}

{'date': u'2006-07-31', 'rating_score': u'80.0%', 'rating_title': u'liked it', 'review_text': u'I have mild adult acne and have used loads of glycolic cleansers. This one is good because it removes my makeup and leaves my skin clean but it doesnt create a lather.', 'author_name': u'Karen'}

{'date': u'2005-09-24', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Finally! One that works!', 'review_text': u"My make-up artist told me to switch to a glycolic acid cleanser two years ago.  I didn't.    I continued to struggle with mild acne, trying everything out there.  I was even put on an antibiotic and used Retin-A Micro for several months.  Nothing worked!    This cleanser started to clear up my skin immediately.  I broke out a little at first, but I think that was just because it was drawing all the bad stuff out of my skin.    Now, I have the skin I've always wanted.  The cleanser even got rid of those whiteheads on my chin that I thought would never go away.    I only wish I had listened two years ago!", 'author_name': u'Mallory'}

description: 3LAB M Cream is the first cosmetic product that contains stem cells from the rare Uttweiler Spatlauber Swiss apple, so rare that only three trees remain in existence! This luxury skin de-stressing cream works to increase resiliency and cellular turnover while giving the skin a naturally radiant glow from the inside out.

3LAB M Cream hydrates and firms the skin with Nano-Claire GY™, the world's first bioengineered growth hormone. PhytoCellTec™ Malus Domestica, stem cells from a rare Swiss Apple that have been proven to slow down and delay the aging process. Happybelle, a plant-based beta endorphin, stimulates key enzymes in the receptor system helping to relieve skin aggressors and bring out natural radiance while fighting the root causes of environmental damage and also contains Osilift which immediately firms the skin and relaxes muscle contractions.
benefit: Immediately firms the skin and gives a radiant, youthful glow.
Provides the skin with vital stress-relieving nutrients and makes it feel "happy" and uplifted.
Helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines over time.
Relaxes facial muscles and reduces wrinkles.

name: Astara Blue Flame Purification Mask
description: The Astara Blue Flame Purification Mask gets super results and is Astara's most popular face mask. Ultra purification herbal and plant substances with natural therapeutic anti-bacterial, anti-microbial benefits, deeply extract and purify pores while nourishing and strengthening the skin's natural resistance. Excellent for most skin problems, especially blemishes. Use as overnight dot therapy on breakouts. The Blue Flame Mask works great as a preventive for skin problems, and generally to simply purify the skin.
Recommended for skin problems, excessive oiliness, and for anyone living in a city, or polluted environment.

{'date': u'2012-05-04', 'rating_score': u'80.0%', 'rating_title': u'A good weekly mask for combination skin', 'review_text': u"I don't have acne, but I do get break-outs especially as I live in a very humid climate much of the year. {'date': u'2012-03-12', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Good for Cystic Acne', 'review_text': u"Lately, I've been having a 1 or 2 cystic acne that are painful to touch on my forehead due to stress from eating junk food and studying and stress all combined. regimen: Step 1: AssemblyPlace disc on motor shaft. Simply push on tightly. To remove; PullOff. Important: There are 2 disc sizes. One for the body and onefor the face. See recommended usage below. Place the cap overthe disc. Screw 1/4 turn and seal tight. There must be a seal inorder to create the vacuum and suction. Connect cord to unit andpower supply and plug in.STEP 2: Wash Your SkinCleanse and Wash. Remove all oil, makeup, and dirt. Make sure your hair is out of the way andcovered or pulled back off of your face.STEP 3: TechniquePull skin tight for a smooth surface. Place your fingers on the skin and stretch theskin so that it is tight where the tip will make contact with the skin. Keep the unitmoving constantly over your skin.Do not hover in one spot.Be sure the cap is flush with your skin, maintaining even contact. This will ensure aproper suction. The motor sound will change when suction occurs.Small Disc: Use the small disc around tight spots on the nose or where your boneswill not allow suction. The large disc should only be used on the body and not on theface.STEP 4: TreatmentUse light pressure with early treatments. As you become skilled with this tool you can become moreaggressive and use more pressure. Be careful not to grind to deep. Move the disc in upward andhorizontal motions until you have treated all areas of the surface. If you have trouble spots take alittle more time on these areas. Be careful not to press to hard or stay to long in one place. Keep thedisc moving over the surface or your skin.STEP 5: Cell RenewalCell rejuvenation and renewal serums and creams are essential to the healing process andrecovery. Use your choice of products daily in between treatments.STEP 6: Follow-Up and MaintenanceClean the filter and residue out of the cap and motor shaft. Clean with a damp cloth in andaround motor shaft.Replace discs after every two to three treatments. For maximum effectiveness, the abrasive on thediscs must be fresh.Recommended usage: Once a week.Note: The green disc has a coarse grit for more aggressive treatments. The blue has moderate grit.
description: Personal microdermabrasion tool comes with two different sizes of disc attachments, offering two different grits for exfoliation. Vacuum action in the tool sucks the skin into the rotating disc, bringing blood flow and collagen to the surface. Removes the thin layer of dead skin cells so that rejuvenation creams and serums can sink deeper into the skin and work more effectively.
Please note this item is a 110V electrical device.
benefit: Greatly enhances poor, dull skin texture by gently resurfacing the superficial skin layers.

{'date': u'2012-07-17', 'rating_score': u'40.0%', 'rating_title': u'Nice product but Obagi is much better', 'review_text': u'I use Obagi Vit C 20% which is MEDICAL GRADE product vit c (this is not). I read the advertisements for the Perricone c ester and thought maybe he had something with his new research. It comes in 4 mini tubes to keep the product fresh (which I like) and I\'ve used a full tube and don\'t see much difference in my skin. It smells great and feels nice and absorbs super fast. The Obagi is a dif consistency but absorbs quickly and once it does and you add your sunscreen it\'s fine. Also, one of the main purposes for C is an antioxidant and is supposed to be applied in the morning to protect against the sun and this suggests night time application. That threw me a little and I don\'t have as much faith in the product. Use Obagi, it\'s cheaper and lasts much longer (you only need about 10 drops for you entire face) and works better. If you use it, and have dry skin get the lower concentration or oily skin needs the highest concentration. The more vit c in the product the more drying it can be however is does not dry mu face at all and I use the 20%. Hope this helps someone,. I do like some of Perricone"s products but this one isn\'t so great.', 'author_name': u'NolaBama'}

reviews: {'date': u'2016-10-15', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Great Night Cream', 'review_text': u"I'm in my late 50's and have been fortunate for not having wrinkles yet but I do have other skin issues associated with aging. The rose scent isn't overwhelming and I find it soothing and calming when I'm turning in for the night.  The skin tone and dullness have diminished. One of the warnings on the package says to not put the cream on your eyelids which I was doing for a while out of sheer laziness.  Um....don't put the cream on your eyes unless you like really pale eyelids.", 'author_name': u'Momona'}

{'date': u'2015-03-20', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'nice night lotion', 'review_text': u"I've been using this sporadically for a few months and really like it; I think I will appreciate it even more when the temperatures climb and I want lighter weight night treatments. First off I'm a big Korres fan as they use high quality ingredients for a reasonable price. This cream looks thick in the jar but melts into the skin quickly and is actually not all that hydrating/heavy, so for really dry skin types this may not be the product for you. It does contain a lot of vitamin C which is unusual for a nighttime cream. My one gripe about this is that the rosehip oil makes this heavily scented, so if you're scent-sensitive this is definitely not for you. I haven't noticed a dramatic difference in my skin since using this cream, but then again I'm not using it every night; when I do use it, my skin feels soft and refreshed in the morning. Overall a nice cream that I will continue to use.", 'author_name': u'nobska19'}

reviews: {'date': u'2013-12-10', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Love it so far!', 'review_text': u"At first I didn't like this mineral makeup. {'date': u'2011-03-07', 'rating_score': u'60.0%', 'rating_title': u'still not sure about this foundation', 'review_text': u"I found this foundation very hard to apply. It is very thick and hard to spread out with a small amount so I think I used more than I should have. I must say the coverage is amazing. My skin looked beautiful at first, but when I looked in the mirror close up at the end of the day, it did not look so good. It seemed to make some dry patches look worse and looked cakey. I just bought the sponge for the blush, so I may try using that to apply this foundation and see how it works. The lightest shade in the sample pack is also slighly too light for me and the next shade is too dark, so I wish there were more shades to choose from. It did not break me out or irritate my skin at all and I have very sensitive acne prone dry skin. I may give it another try using the sponge. We'll see.", 'author_name': u'salsagirl'}

reviews: {'date': u'2015-09-24', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Love this', 'review_text': u"I have KP and redness on my chest from sun damage. Before paying $60 for an rx to treat kp I thought I would try this.It works. The redness on my chest has subsided greatly in a few week of use. In conjunction with Glytone's exfoliating body cleanser, my KP looks & feels better.Has a strong pumpkin smell. I am always congested & have difficulty smelling things...I can smell this. Not much pumps out so you'll have to use 6-8 pumps to use on lower legs. 2 for back of arms.", 'author_name': u'flynnsmom'}

{'date': u'2015-04-16', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Favorite Body Lotion', 'review_text': u"This is the best body lotion I've ever used. My skin is so smooth and even-toned! I have moderate/severe keratosis pillaris (small bumps) on the back of my arms and on my upper thighs, and this lotion has significantly reduced the bumpiness in these areas. Each time I use it, I see improvement. Other reviewers have commented on the scent, and I can understand these if you dislike the scent of pumpkin, but the scent isn't too sweet or heavy, and all the pumpkin scent evaporates in a few minutes after application, leaving a very light, pleasant spice scent. I asked several people if they could smell pumpkin on my skin, and nobody could. They all noticed the mild spice scent, but they all said it was nice and delicate. They also couldn't smell anything until they put their noses right up to my skin. I am very sensitive to scents, especially fruity, sweet scents, and I had no problem with this lotion. I did notice a slight tingle in a few areas, but it was mild and brief. I am careful to only use this lotion the day after I shave, as it will sting very much on freshly shaved skin. Like all ARCONA products, a little goes a long way. I use this lotion in conjunction with the ARCONA fruit enzyme body scrub, and they seem to work very well together. My skin is softer, more even toned, and all those little bumps are gone. I am continually impressed with the amazing results from all the ARCONA products. I don't use anything else. I highly recommend this body lotion!", 'author_name': u'katherinenicole'}

{'date': u'2012-08-16', 'rating_score': u'80.0%', 'rating_title': u'Good...but smelly', 'review_text': u"I like this product, works good for keratosis pilaris issues for me. As with all Arcona products, the smell is quite strong. I don't mind this spicy pumpkin smell, but I think someone else may not like it so much. I suppose this is why I can't use their other items as that they all seem too scented to me. I just prefer no fragrance as opposed to so many fragrances working all at once, not pleasant I would think. I may buy this one again.", 'author_name': u'Liz1'}
